Kids are encouraged to think and learn in a fun environment, with enthusiastically committed teachers focused on the health, happiness and success of your children.
It is the policy of the ECO School that it shall not discriminate on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color and/or national origin in the administration of educational policies, scholarships, opportunities or any other school programs.
WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET
Revenues generated from student tuition will not meet the full costs to educate each student. That’s why the ECO School must generate income from private donations, corporate contributions, grants and other fundraising.
Donations impact lives. Donations power us to properly meet the developmental and educational needs of school age children. So they are healthy. So they are happy. So they become learners, thinkers and doers.
After ECO School operating costs are covered, 100% of this fundraisers proceeds will be used to fund student tuition.


THE IMPACT
Your contribution will make a difference in the lives and health of entire generations of children. By teaching kids how to live naturally and eat the right foods as part of their elementary education, your contribution will help them gain a school to provide the necessary foundation for healthy living.
The Drs. Wolfson have been quite successful at teaching people how to live naturally, without prescription medications or invasive procedures. They’ve been featured on NBC and CNN, as well as The Wall Street Journal and USA Today. They are two of the most followed and trusted holistic physicians on Facebook.
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Take action! Feed kids only organic Paleo foods. Remove environmental pollutants by using only natural household cleaning and personal care products. Encourage kids to be active outside every day.
Follow The Drs. Wolfson on Facebook! We’ll be posting a series of articles that explore ways to keep kids healthy naturally, and ways to properly educate elementary school age children.
Help spread the word! Use this campaign’s social sharing buttons, conveniently located next to the Back It button in the top right section of this page. Let your friends and family know about this important cause and encourage them to support it with a donation!

ABOUT THE DRS. WOLFSON
The Drs. Wolfson are doctors that have emerged as two of the world’s leading natural holistic health physicians. Their natural holistic health information, natural lifestyle and natural healthcare approaches have been featured on NBC and CNN, and in publications like the USA Today, The Wall Street Journal and The Washington Post. They are amongst the most followed natural holistic health doctors on Facebook. Tens of thousands of people watch their natural health videos, hundreds of thousands read their posts each week, and more than 100,000 doctors and people just like you have attended their speeches and training. Dr. Heather Wolfson is a chiropractor. Dr. Jack Wolfson is a board-certified cardiologist, author of the # 1 Amazon best-seller, The Paleo Cardiologist: The Natural Way to Heart Health, and winner for the Natural Choice Award as a holistic M.D. Together, this husband and wife team are The Drs. Wolfson.
If you have any questions about the ECO School or this fundraiser campaign, please email them to health@thedrswolfson.com

story:
Versiunea in limba română

We are a team which started an educational project that's been going for 5 years now and hundreds of people came here to learn. Over the years we studied ecological architecture and permaculture design in order to bring you the best quality education in acroecology and natural construction.

Baza Ulmu is a unique permaculture design school where people from all around the world come and learn natural building, no till gardening, food forests and much more useful information following the key permaculture design principles. We are here to give you the right tools and neccessary skills to create your abundant landscape and/or eco-house with all the facilities in order improve the quality of life for you and your family.

Andrei is a designer and passionate eco-builder who teaches natural building. From concept to implementation, anything is possible within reason. Find his C.V. here.

Lucian can walk you through our no dig, productive food systems and tell you things you never knew about the magic in the plant kingdom. C.V.

Roxi has translated permaculture books and helped with the immigration situation from Africa.

We are dedicated to things that really matter!

Baza Ulmu was created to inspire people of all ages. 

An international project developed by its co-founders and people from all around the world have helped make this dream come true and now we can say it's time to turn this into a public educational space. We bring in permaculture designers and architects as well as eco-builders for courses to teach people how to start their own projects, build their houses or grow their food in a sustainable way. Sometimes entire classrooms of children come here with their teachers and we don't have the necessary facilities to accommodate them. This campaign will help create the right learning conditions for people of all ages and will give an example for other educational projects.

We want to dedicate ourselves full-time to this project that can go on for decades. 

Together we can make a world class permaculture center where people can learn the importance of where their food comes from, agroecology systems, passive solar houses, alternative energy and much more. Everything we've done so far was through our own effort and honest earned money which is quite limited (minimum wage in Romania is 220 euro/month).

Together we can produce valuable video content for everyone! 

 

“ Come to this place and get to learn some permaculture, some natural building techniques / It’s lovely place in the middle of nature. / With very involved very motivated knowledgeble pleople sharing what they learned in the past years with you”.

                                       TUDOR Petrutiu - Romanian Permaculture Association

 

 

 

 

What if there was a place like a Hobbit land in the middle of nature where you could come and learn everything you wanted to know about eco-building about permaculture, agroecology, passive solar houses, rocket stoves, plants and animals, growing your own food or sustainability?

What if you could learn all this through online courses made specially for your needs, both from a classroom environment and directly from the field when we go to clients for consultancy.

What if there was also a glamping resort wher you could come and get hosted?

What about a space designed especially for children where adults and children alike could come and learn thru play and non formal education?

In order for you to fully enjoy our educational center we need to build a classroom for the courses, develop the glamping resort for good accommodation, make a communal kitchen and dinning space and built showers. This would make it fit for an educational trip and a summer retreat vacation.

 

This picture represents "poster A"

“The aim is to teach people how to acomplish these things because now everybody is living in the city and it’s very hard for them to learn these skills, these practical skills. /Using a chainsaw chopping some wood, maybe climbing on a ladder, everything. / What type of wood is a certain tree when you see it, how to use it in a bio-construction.”

                                               Lupse Andrei - designer and co-counder of Baza Ulmu

 

“I think it’s better to give Idea as soon as possible to the young people, Mr Clint - Tell you the truth. like this they are not contaminated with all they can see all the common things we can see in real life like a big big building and wood and bitumen. / So educate them, I think it’s always a question of education.

/ For all things, all that go bad, I think that education can change it.”

                                                    Ludo  - Ermitaj Malin (the first permaculture center in Romania)

This picture represents "wallpaper A"

It was an amazing experience creating BAZA ULMU, but we are a small team and we can’t do everything on our own. That’s why we ask your help so we can improve the quality of our corses and to build all the facilities needed in order to bring more people in and to make sure that everyone takes home a wealth of information as well as an amazing experience!

  With 10.000 USD we can build a classroom with all the necessary equipment and accommodation for overnight stay for 24 people. 

The cost of the classroom + equipment is 4000 USD

The cost of accommodation huts is 1000 USD/hut x 6 can host 4 people/hut

With 15000USD we could finish the main house, build the classroom, huts and plant our entire food forest and make a new film.

With 20000USD we could have all of the above plus off the grid electricity and the ability to invest in a business that can generate our income so that we can become financially independent.  

 

 

 

What if you could learn to design natural integrated systems that produce healthy and abundant food indefinitely?

You could meet a lot of people who have the same mindset about ecology.

You could have some hands on experience and practice some skills which they could never do in a classic city classroom.

You could learn how to use some tools like different hand tools and start getting building start to get designing…

Finding solutions for building your home with natural materials and techniques can be difficult.

So is designing a food production system… It’s amazing how many people design and build their houses without considering their health, esthetics or ergonomics.

By choosing the right kind of materials and techniques and learning how to design these natural buildings you could not only save a lot of money but also have a farm where you feel in a holiday year round.

Here you could learn how to use different tools for building, gardening and designing that will help you develop and implement your own plan.

This picture represents "postcard A"

 

“We offer a variety of couses including whole system design, starfing your own farm, leisure center or building your own house with all the neccesary facilities.”

                                                                      Lupse Lucian - co-founder/media director

What I find really really great at Baza Ulmu is that they-re organising a lot of courses, summer courses, a lot of workshops. / This is quite amazing because this way you can reach a lot of people.

                                                                  Catalin Savin - FEAST Theatre, FEAST Fest  

 

“At our countryside we have another place and it went also as well, almost as well as here and it’s all perfect / We’re starting to grow mushrooms now, and it’s gonna be a promising year for us. / Permaculture should be the Future”

                                                                                  Stefan Veronescu - permaculture student

 

This picture represents "poster B"

We carefully take every step of our way in order to provide you with two valuable films you can enjoy and get a lot of good information out of.

Film 1 - Baza Ulmu - the journey begins

This film is about our project, how it started up until this very moment. It includes specific information about our design and how everything is interconnected eg: the water from the roof is collected with no visible piping and goes passively into the garden which doesn't need any additional water year round. 

How we've built our permanent raised beds and how we manage them

Tools we use, food forest strategies

Real designs for real clients that we break down with you

Frequently asked questions and more

Film 2  - Bio-construction - how to

This picture represents "wallpaper B"

This film, you guessed it, is about natural building. It includes specific information about earth friendly materials and how to design and build a lasting and beautiful house, but also annexes such as: root cellar, terrace, solar shower, rocket mass heaters, rocket stoves, living roofs and more.

Subjects followed in the film:  What is bio-construction? How to design from scratch or upgrade your home. What you want vs what you need. Maximising resources. Passive solar houses. Different building techniques and materials: Superadobe, cordwood, living roofs, cob, thatch, wood, rocket mass heaters, 

Discussions on designs we made for different clients and situations. Frequently asked questions and many more.

Andrei studied design and ecological architecture and is working with architects and engineers to provide projects for others. 

Lucian studied film making to make all this possible, video is a powerful educational tool and with your help we can make more content in the future.

We've put together a variety of perks to include everyone's possibilities, whether you're a fan or future eco-builder/permaculture designer there is something for everybody.

Ex. check out the T-shirts 

     If we don't reach our entire goal we will focus on building the classroom and perhaps one or two accommodation huts but it's going to take us a very long time without your help perhaps years. And the films have already entered the production stage so they will be done within our established time frame.

 

You can be a part of this journey by helping this campaign to reach it’s goal!  

What would you do to help bringing this kind of project to life?

Would you contribute with your donation to bring this kind of place one step closer to reality?

Where almost there it just needs an little extra help from the public who supports this kind of actions. It just needs a little more investment to bring this project to a whole new level.

This picture represents "postcard B"

With your help, we can create an educational space which you and your friends, as well as thousands of other people will enjoy later on by attending our classes. Children need to take part in non formal education as well as ecological education as soon as possible. The outdoors and fresh air as well as healthy food combined with dynamic activities is a winning situation in which kids could learn about the importance of where their food comes from and how to play in an Earth safe environment.

Our project has already gained a lot of media attention and was featured in many newspapers, articles online and tv programmes:

We are always invited for talks in the country and abroad and are active members in the Romanian Permaculture Association. Starting February we will finish the necessary paperwork to create Baza Ulmu Association. 

Risks & Challenges

We will do our very best to finish our entire design of our education centre in a timely manner however it's pretty hard to find skilled workers that are able to stay for a couple of months (commuting is impractical every day because we are 20 km from the city in a mountaneous area). We do almost everything ourselves and are working around the clock sometimes 12 hrs a day rain or shine. Another issue is the films as they are not yet produced. We have about 90% of the video and audio we want to use and are working with a storyboard. However this is the first time we take on such a demanding challenge of completing two films in a matter of months in a 3 people team. Lucian spent around 500 euro only for ALL of the filming equipment including the post production software so cost isn't really an issue. Almost all our footage has been filmed and edited with this equipment.  We are very optimistic! 

We’ve  put together an amazing group of collaborators and partners

Hundreds of volunteers have helped and learned in this center in 5 years!

Now this is where you come in: we are so close of bringing BAZA ULMU SCHOOL to life but we need your support to help complete this project so we can share this knowledge to the world!

Please share our Indiegogo campain on the link bellow,and donate as much as you can in order to help this project come to life!

Meet the team!

 

 

   Lucian Lupse

 

Andrei Lupse

Roxana Lupse

 

THANK YOU!       THANK YOU!       THANK YOU!

 

* I really like this crowdsourcing because this is where people can direct their money into things they really like / So I think it’s an honest way to get some funding while other conventional funding systems like EU funds or what not funds, they’re very strict, rigid, they have pretentions. / They don’t neccesarily support a vision while many individuals can help support a vision."

                                                             Tudor Petrutiu -  Romanian Permaculture Association

Other Ways You Can Help

  1. Spread the word on all social media platforms 
  2. Talk to your friends and family about our project
  3. You can use the Indiegogo share tools!
  4. Follow our journey to keep in touch with new content
  5. Make a difference one step at a time

story:
Noted Filmmaker and Social Commentator Anthony B. Rodriguez Embarks on a New Stage in His Cultural Revolution!

For almost a decade, Anthony B. Rodriguez has been a thought leader in environmental activism and self-empowerment. His popular YouTube channel Revolutionofthought1 has showcased how he has made conscious changes to his life in an effort to live in harmony with the planet. He has learned to forage for wild food, grow his own food and learn about how other cultures live self-sufficiently. 

In the course of living a more natural life, Anthony has traveled the globe taking photographs, producing hundreds of videos and making two feature films, including one about the Amazon jungle. He plans on making more inspirational films that celebrate environmental and social consciousness, but is lacking the requisite equipment. Once he acquires the filmmaking equipment, Anthony plans to cover some of the world’s most troubling challenges, and potential solutions.

For the year of 2016 I have been writing and conceptualizing two new feature films, as well as drawing connections to how they are relevant to the issues of contemporary times. These films will bring me around the country & the globe, as well as cover some major problems humanity is facing today, and delve into solutions! 

So I ask you to donate and help these projects become a reality so that I may continue to work and inspire! 

What We Need & What You Get

The amount of money I am trying to raise is $25,000. With these raised funds I will purchase all the gear necessary to create the high quality feature films. A portion of the funds will go to travels for me to be able to make it to the locations of some keys characters in the film. These funds will be development funds, to get the ball rolling on these feature films. With this I will pay for the following:

  • FULL GEAR LIST (INCLUDING CAMARA)  $15,000
  • TRAVEL FEES TO CREATE FILM TRAILERS. $8,000
  • MOVIE WEBSITES, MOTION GRAPHICS FOR FILMS, ECT.. $2,000

The Impact

Due to the environmental, political, and social climate we are currently in. I believe now more than ever is the time to produce progressive and forward thinking pieces of work that people can receive in a time when they need it the most!

​

Other Ways You Can Help

  • MAKING A HEFTY DONATION
  • SHARING THIS LINK WITH EVERYONE YOU KNOW
  • CONNECTING ME WITH SOURCES WHO MAY BE WILLING TO HELP
  • GETTING EXCITED FOR THE AMAZING FILMS TO COME

Due to the environmental, political, and social climate we are currently in. I believe now more than ever is the time to produce progressive and forward thinking pieces of work that people can receive in a time when they need it the most!
​

Other Ways You Can Help


MAKING A HEFTY DONATION
SHARING THIS LINK WITH EVERYONE YOU KNOW
CONNECTING ME WITH SOURCES WHO MAY BE WILLING TO HELP
GETTING EXCITED FOR THE AMAZING FILMS TO COME

story:
Short Summary

I am Arnes Klisura. I have bachelor degree in Physics. I am big fan of non formal learning and all kind of online learning. I love MOOC's (massive on line courses provided on web sites like edx.org, coursera.org, alison.com, khanacademy.org and many others). I have found out that even if I pass 10 000 of those on line courses, there is no way to prove it because there is no platform that integrates all of them. I want to be able to prove my mastery of the subject and to get diploma for it which will be as valid as standard University diplomas.

Being that there are very few if any companies that can make qualitative and quantitive analysis of a person mastery at any subject, I decided to create my own, with your help. It will be our platform that will inspire millions and help them to get recognition as experts based on their mastery and it does not matter how did they achieve it.

More then anything else, this platform will integrate all kinds of learning. For example someone with bachelor degree in mathematics from some University will be able with small donation to get recognition in all the world for his mastery. 

Mastery will be like a education game, where you can make infinite progress and where you can make it as fast as you can. It will be standardized and no cheating will be possible. For everything there will be points. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Quality costs, but the good thing about online stuff is that once its made it can serve generations and generations. With your investment in online education, you serve millions of people. 
  • Any amount we get will go in creating online educational platform based on gamification.

The Impact

 

  • With mastery.edu everyone everywhere will be able to get recognition for his mastery in anything. 
  • Learning will be more fun and more rewarding.
  • There will be integration of all kind of education. 

Risks & Challenges

The idea of this website can change the world, but any change has opposition and I can imagine that there will be a lot opposition from traditional educational institutions and some competitors online could make impact of this smaller, but I believe that it can become as popular as Facebook or Google through some time.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Join the team

story:
So, here’s the scoop:

We are building a state-of-the-art indoor shooting range in Jones County, Ms.  With your help we can get it built and available to you by late 2018.  

The Range is for you.  For those who don’t have a place it will provide a safe place for you to shoot and sharpen your skills.  For those who can shoot in your back yard it will provide a little something different by providing that indoor shooting range experience.  It will help you be more than just a gun owner.  Through practice or instruction, you can become a skilled shooter.  It’s for creating memories and fulfilling your dreams like shooting that AK-47 you've always seen in the movies. It’s to strengthen our 2nd Amendment rights, and to reinforce time-honored firearms sporting traditions for generations to come.  

This is your chance to get some perks that will never be offered again. Why not be a part of something special? This is your opportunity to pitch in and be involved in building something new and beneficial for our community.  

We will make it well worth your while...

We understand that your time is valuable so we've included detailed information for your review so let's "GIT R DUN"!!!

5 reasons why you don't want to miss this….

1)  ONCE IN A LIFETIME PERKS

Sometimes you’ve only got ONE chance at a sweet deal. These perks won’t be available again. Don’t miss out!

2)  IMPROVE YOUR SKILLS….AND HAVE SOME FUN

Jones County and our surrounding communities need an indoor shooting range. The Range will be a crisp, modern facility that meets those needs.  

If a firearm is in your arsenal to protect your family and home, having a place to practice and train is a must.  The Range will provide you the opportunity to improve your shooting skills, and get some professional training if you’d like.  The Range will provide an array of instructional classes designed to teach you, and your family the safe, effective, proper use and storage of firearms. Safer homes mean safer communities.

Plus, Jones County could always use a place for good clean fun. This will be a great place for family outings, dates, and other events that make memories for you and your family, and friends. 

3)  MAKE A DIFFERENCE  

Most of us had someone take the time to teach us the value of gun safety. Someone who taught us that responsible gun ownership improves the safety for the entire community. 

If you had a chance to make a difference in our community, would you do it?  By participating in The Range's campaign you have that opportunity.  The Range will provide an atmosphere and resources that create responsible gun owners, one experience at a time.

If you strongly believe in these principals this is your chance to make a difference in our community while gaining some special Perks in the process.

4) SHOOT BEFORE YOU BUY!

Ever bought a gun then realized after shooting it that you didn't like it?  When you bought your last gun, did you get to shoot it first?  Ever seen a pistol or rifle in the store that you wanted but would like to shoot before you buy?

At The Range you will be able to rent that firearm to make sure it fits you and what you need it for....before you buy.

5)  LIVE YOUR DREAMS

Ever wanted to shoot an AK-47?  How about those pistols from the Bond films?  Would you like the chance to fire a fully automatic firearm?  What about getting your hands on your favorite guns from Call of Duty?  

The Range is going to give you access to some of the best and most popular firearms in the world....including some that are fully automatic that are just for fun!

So........, if any of this excites you, here's what you should do:

MIX AND MATCH ANY (OR ALL) OF THE FOLLOWING:

1)  Pick a perk! - Just click the "Perk" boxes on the right.  (more details listed below)

2)  Send this page to people you know will be interested.

3)  Like us (@thefreestaterange) on Facebook

4)  Share your thoughts with us!  Suggestions and encouragement help us and mean a lot!

SOME DETAILS ON THE PERKS…

1 Year Individual Membership: This means you will get a one-year membership for a single person (nontransferable).  The Membership will cover your range time cost for the entire year (ammunition not included).  Also included is choice of one firearm rental per month (ammunition not included) among several other benefits.  Additionally, your yearly renewal price will be at the same discounted price as you get from this campaign.

1 Year Family Membership: This means you will get a one-year membership for your family which includes you and your spouse and children under 18 years old, all who live in the same household (nontransferable). The Membership will cover your range time cost for the entire year (ammunition not included).  Also included is choice of one firearm rental per month (ammunition not included) among several other benefits.  Additionally, your yearly renewal price will be at the same discounted price as you get from this campaign.

Lifetime Membership: This means you will get a lifetime membership as described for the Individual or Family Perk you choose (ammunition not included).  Also included is choice of one firearm rental per month (ammunition not included) among several other benefits.  Again, you will never have to pay for range time ever again!

Business Founder Sponsor Memberships #1 thru #6: You will have Founder Sponsor status along with a Lifetime Membership as described in the Business Perk you choose.  Also included is choice of one firearm rental per month (ammunition not included) among several other benefits (see Business Perks #1 thru #6).  In addition to those great perks, your company logo or company name will be prominently displayed in The Range either on The Wall of Founders (Business Perks 1 thru 3), or on one of the firing line stalls (Business Perks 4 thru 6).  Your business will forever be shown as helping to bring The Range to Jones County. 

Here are some examples of how your logo will be designed and displayed:

Pistol and Fully Automatic rental package: This means that you will be able to choose from our rental inventory one pistol and one fully automatic firearm, each with one loaded magazine or 30 round belt depending on the machine gun you choose. 

Friend of the 2nd Amendment donation: Lastly, we are also offering a $5 Friend of the 2nd Amendment donation for people who like the idea of The Range in Jones County, but really don’t ever see being able to visit us at The Range. This is something that can help the cause just because you believe it’s a good thing.

You are not locked into any one amount. You can donate $1 or all $25K.  You don’t have to get a perk, but we think that it’s a pretty good way to give to the cause and get yourself a great deal in the process. 

Who we are?

Since the start of our journey to bring The Range to Jones County we've had many folks ask, "Who is behind this, or who are you?" My name is David Page.  I'm a retired US Army helicopter pilot and Infantryman.  I grew up in Ovett so I'm native to Jones County.  I love our God, my family, and our country. I'm currently contracted with the US Department of State where I've worked around the world from Colombia, South America to Pakistan and Iraq.  I've served our country around the world, but now I'm ready to come home to provide a service to our communities through The Range.

Why are we doing this?

1) One of the simplest answers is that Jones County doesn’t have an indoor shooting range.  We believe that folks who use an indoor range are tired of driving more than an hour to get that indoor range experience.

2) We know that there are many folks who live in a place where they cannot just shoot in their back yard. Plus, The Range will be a safe, affordable place for those who do have a place to shoot.

3) We have roots in our communities through generations and we want to build a unique experience that isn’t available close by. 

4) We realize that there are many people who would like to experience shooting a fully automatic firearm or their favorite gun from a movie. At The Range we'll make those dreams come true. You’ll be able to shoot some guns typically unavailable to the folks unless you're in Law Enforcement or the military.  While under the supervision of a trained range safety officer, you can experience shooting fully automatic, silenced, and belt-fed firearms.

So...whether you’re a hunter, a sports shooter, just want to make sure your sights are still on target, or just want to have some fun....we’ll be there to help you meet your goals at The Range.

Why should you care?

Have you ever found a gun that you liked but wanted to shoot before you bought...just to make sure it fit you and the purpose you wanted it for?  At The Range we'll have a wide selection of rental firearms so you'll know before you buy if that gun meets your needs.

We are genuinely passionate about helping folks enjoy the sport of shooting. The Range will provide a positive, safe, and low-pressure environment for all shooters, especially those new to the sport. We look forward to helping everyone new to the sport become acquainted with the basics of firearms safety, operations, and marksmanship.  The Range will extend the values and positive experiences of responsible gun ownership in our community.

We firmly believe that education, training, and exposure are key factors in decreasing the number of gun related incidents and gun violence across our country. With specialized skill-based classes and personal instruction The Range will enlighten and equip folks in our communities to be responsible gun owners.

The Range will also be a great example to our state officials and the nation on some of the positive aspects of firearms usage. We plan to reduce ignorance and negligence with respect to the functionality, purpose, and legal use of firearms. We hope that with enhanced experiences and real understanding, we can demonstrate to our community, elected officials in Mississippi, and our nation that lawful gun ownership enhances our lives. Safe gun ownership is a pillar of the American way of life that we will protect and promote.

What is the range going to look like?

Here’s what we envision…

Shooting Lanes:

Our plan is to start out with eight (8) lanes. Future add ons to the building could include more firing lanes or an indoor archery range.

Each lane will have individual stalls, separating you from other shooters.  They are high quality, heavy-duty stalls. And yes, they are bulletproof!  Each lane will also have a shooter’s table to load your firearms/magazines to keep your stuff organized.  

Target Systems: 

The target retrieval systems are electronic allowing you to determine the length and reset your targets with a push of a button. No need to wait for a cease-fire to manually move or recover  your targets.

Ventilation System: 

Clean air and ventilation for an indoor range is a must!  Your health and safety is top priority.  The Range will have a powerful ventilation system that will ventilate the lead and other air-borne toxins. It is one of the costliest components of The Range but we will not compromise your health.  

Our ventilation system will exceed NIOSH, EPA, and OSHA air quality standards.

Gun Shop:

Our gun shop will carry the latest and greatest rifles, pistols, shotguns, ammo, tools, supplies, and accessories.  It’ll be the place to rent that special firearm you’ve always dreamed of shooting, or the one you like before you purchase it. 

Class Room: 

Our classrooms will hold up to 12 students.  We plan to have weekly classes from first time shooter classes to instructor level courses.  So, if you are just starting out or if you want to get more involved in the shooting industry, you can find the training you are looking for.

What guns can I rent/try at the range?

You’ll be able to shoot a wide range of firearms at The Range.  We will have an assortment of pistols from Glock, Springfield, Ruger, Walther, and more. Our rifle collection will range from older style firearms to modern day AR’s and AK-47s. Most exciting will be our fully automatic rentals which will include magazine and belt-fed models. We will constantly be updating our rental inventory throughout the lifetime of The Range.

These are just a few we plan to have:

So, if you are still reading right now, you clearly care about this and you should be involved.  

Grab a perk while you can, and send us an email at thefreestaterange@gmail.com.  We truly want to hear your thoughts and ideas.

We can’t wait to meet you at The Range.

We promise you’ll have a blast! 

Note: There is no risk to you with this campaign.  If for any reason The Range project does not go through you will be refunded your full amount.  Information on the refund policy here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

story:
3 years ago I’ve started filming. Short films, social ads, video art projects, documentaries etc., highlighting topics of violence against women, LGBT, war, gender inequality. Believing that love, freedom and beauty can empower people and make a change in this world. 

As a result of my 3 years work, my short films were presented at such festivals as OIFF (the biggest film festival in Ukraine), Cannes Film Festival Short Film Corner, VAEFF (one of the major festivals of experimental cinema in USA) and others.  And now, I have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, to study in AFI Conservatory - one of the top film schools in the world. 

 

But let me take you from the beginning. 

In my house the air was always breathing with stories, and it became the only air I ever wanted to breathe. And my life was going only in one direction — towards the directing department. But economical situation in Ukraine and in my family was very hard those days and my father told me that to be a film director and to be a prostitute are the same in our country. 

So I ended up at first at the department of Economics and then Fine Art. During my studies I worked as journalist, art curator, lecturer, performer. But all this time I never stopped writing scripts, stories and watching, watching, watching movies, knowing that cinema is the only domain I want to be in. As Fellini once said «Only people with rich life experience and massive cultural background can become great film directors». So I was getting mine, always remembering where it should lead me.  

One day, on the beginning of Ukrainian Maidan, while heading to the Red Cross nurses courses I’ve asked myself - how can I fight back against the intolerance, hatred, stereotypes, violence and inequality? And is this really how I want to die, never trying the only thing I want to be doing? So I’ve decided to finally start filming, despite everything that was going on. Because only with films I can fight for what I believe in and make a change. 

Here are some of my works:

 

 

 

But the more I was filming and writing, the more vividly I realized how desperately I need more advanced knowledge in this field. I need to make my stories more powerful. So I decided to take my chances and apply to my «dream place» - the AFI Conservatory, one of the top film schools in the world. And on April 3d I received an e-mail that changed my life. I was admitted.

 

 

 I’ve being admitted and received an opportunity to enter the AFI Conservatory despite the huge competition. Moreover, I also have received one of the most prestigious AFI Scholarships, which David Linch received when he was studying in this school - $10. 000 per year. 

WHAT IS AFI CONSERVATORY 

This program is something like an MBA in the film world, a unique 2-year program available only to film directors who have previous experience. Only around 30 young directors from all over the world are admitted to the program every year and I am one of the lucky ones. 

Among AFI’s alumni are such directors as David Lynch (Mulholland Drive, Blue Velvet), Darren Aronofsky (Requiem for a Dream, Black Swan, Mother!), Andrea Arnold (American Honey, Fish Tank, Big Little Lies), Patty Jenkins (Monster, Wonder Woman), Terrence Malick (Days of Heaven, The Thin Red Line, The Tree of Life) and many others amazing storytellers.  

AFI Conservatory alumni have received total of 149 Academy Award nominations and won 30 prizes. 

And now, I have a unique chance to become a part of that society. And I need your help to do that.


WHY I CHOOSE AFI CONSERVATORY? 

1.  To get keys to physical production
2. To direct films under the supervision of working professionals.
3. To collaborate with one of the most talented directing students from all over the world
4. To navigate myself in global movie industry. 
5. To become a powerful film director and tell unique stories. 

COST 

For the first year, I need $90. 000. 

($60.000 is the cost of the tuition for the first year.

Minus $10.000 of given scholarship, makes it $50.000. 

$40.000 will cover the rent, daily expenditures, medical insurance and supplies while my first year in L.A) 

Unfortunately, the program of AFI Conservatory is so intense that it is impossible for students to have part-time work. Moreover, student visa has a limited amount of working hours allowed, so it makes overtime work illegal. 

Cinema empowers people, it gives new meaning and ideas, reveals the depth of human condition and shows the versatility of this world. And I am sure that I can contribute to this world with my ideas. 

But I can do nothing without your help and support. Thank you!
story_txt:
3 years ago I’ve started filming. Short films, social ads, video art projects, documentaries etc., highlighting topics of violence against women, LGBT, war, gender inequality. Believing that love, freedom and beauty can empower people and make a change in this world. As a result of my 3 years work, my short films were presented at such festivals as OIFF (the biggest film festival in Ukraine), Cannes Film Festival Short Film Corner, VAEFF (one of the major festivals of experimental cinema in USA) and others.  And now, I have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, to study in AFI Conservatory - one of the top film schools in the world.  But let me take you from the beginning. In my house the air was always breathing with stories, and it became the only air I ever wanted to breathe. And my life was going only in one direction — towards the directing department. But economical situation in Ukraine and in my family was very hard those days and my father told me that to be a film director and to be a prostitute are the same in our country. So I ended up at first at the department of Economics and then Fine Art. During my studies I worked as journalist, art curator, lecturer, performer. But all this time I never stopped writing scripts, stories and watching, watching, watching movies, knowing that cinema is the only domain I want to be in. As Fellini once said «Only people with rich life experience and massive cultural background can become great film directors». So I was getting mine, always remembering where it should lead me.  One day, on the beginning of Ukrainian Maidan, while heading to the Red Cross nurses courses I’ve asked myself - how can I fight back against the intolerance, hatred, stereotypes, violence and inequality? And is this really how I want to die, never trying the only thing I want to be doing? So I’ve decided to finally start filming, despite everything that was going on. Because only with films I can fight for what I believe in and make a change. Here are some of my works:

 

 

 
But the more I was filming and writing, the more vividly I realized how desperately I need more advanced knowledge in this field. I need to make my stories more powerful. So I decided to take my chances and apply to my «dream place» - the AFI Conservatory, one of the top film schools in the world. And on April 3d I received an e-mail that changed my life. I was admitted.
 

 
 I’ve being admitted and received an opportunity to enter the AFI Conservatory despite the huge competition. Moreover, I also have received one of the most prestigious AFI Scholarships, which David Linch received when he was studying in this school - $10. 000 per year. WHAT IS AFI CONSERVATORY This program is something like an MBA in the film world, a unique 2-year program available only to film directors who have previous experience. Only around 30 young directors from all over the world are admitted to the program every year and I am one of the lucky ones. 

Among AFI’s alumni are such directors as David Lynch (Mulholland Drive, Blue Velvet), Darren Aronofsky (Requiem for a Dream, Black Swan, Mother!), Andrea Arnold (American Honey, Fish Tank, Big Little Lies), Patty Jenkins (Monster, Wonder Woman), Terrence Malick (Days of Heaven, The Thin Red Line, The Tree of Life) and many others amazing storytellers.  AFI Conservatory alumni have received total of 149 Academy Award nominations and won 30 prizes. And now, I have a unique chance to become a part of that society. And I need your help to do that.WHY I CHOOSE AFI CONSERVATORY? 1.  To get keys to physical production2. To direct films under the supervision of working professionals.3. To collaborate with one of the most talented directing students from all over the world4. To navigate myself in global movie industry. 5. To become a powerful film director and tell unique stories. COST For the first year, I need $90. 000. 
($60.000 is the cost of the tuition for the first year.
Minus $10.000 of given scholarship, makes it $50.000. 
$40.000 will cover the rent, daily expenditures, medical insurance and supplies while my first year in L.A) Unfortunately, the program of AFI Conservatory is so intense that it is impossible for students to have part-time work. Moreover, student visa has a limited amount of working hours allowed, so it makes overtime work illegal. Cinema empowers people, it gives new meaning and ideas, reveals the depth of human condition and shows the versatility of this world. And I am sure that I can contribute to this world with my ideas. But I can do nothing without your help and support. Thank you!

story:
Overview

                                                          Celfiefriends Project

 

      Celfiefriends Project is more than an online service platform based on people's needs.

It's a new way to earn extra income a kind of extra part-time job, but you choose what you want to work on or what services you will offer.

 

   

   Starting with the fall of 2017, the Celfiefriends team conducts research studies on the needs of people in private and professional life.

Millions of people have personal needs to solve in a short time and for such a thing can not be set up specialized companies in a particular sector.

 

  How it works?

For each of the categories chosen from the basic menu, you have the following options, any main category such as: 

 

 

for Category - Personal Needs: - You can post ads to help you per example or inside the house or outside for any kind of field. Shopping carts, carrying some heavy things, walk the dog, mowing the lawn, digging, flower-garden arrangements, electrical or sanitary repairs , and many other examples.

more……

 

 

for Category - Exchange of experience: - exchange of experience or volunteering because many mature and young people start a career in a field and after a few years or more, realizing that they do not like what they chose in the past due to lack of experience or other reasons.

We help them figure out what suits them by volunteering in a company for 1 , 2 or 3 days (trial days). It often happens that the volunteer wants to work in that company after the probationary period.

more.....

 

 

for Category - Professional Needs: - You can post ads of type request or offer for: - in a certain field or Job, you want help or you need certain informations (of any kind per example) or professional equipment for sale or rent. Or maybe you have a project to share the work and offer benefits for a fee.   

more...

 

 

for Category - Medical Needs: - in the medical field there are many private medical offices that need certain medical devices for a short period of time, for rent or can move to another location and want to sell them,.... or donate them to other medical offices/ hospitals / or needy children who need small media type equipment (per example:- prostheses, or mobility, and so on).

more....

 

 

for Category - Invest in a child’s Talent/ Education: - You  can help or donate: books, clothes, educational things, money, to help needy children or with high potential - (charity type), for those who do not have financial help and / or live in areas of the world where not even nearby schools are found.  That's why we can make a small donation sometimes.  By helping we become better. 

more....

 

 

and much more…

 

 

+ We will also create a chat to be able to answer any question or information about almost anything.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                     

 

 “What We Need & What You Get”

Through these services all people have financial benefits or solving some needs
There are many people who have free time and no financial income.

That is why people can provide certain services in exchange for money.

 

 

                                             Advantages of the Celfiefriends Project:

-Through the categories from Personal Needs, Professional Needs, Medical Needs, Invest in children's talents and education, Transports- any kind. Here we have a wide variety of possibilities and solutions to people's needs.

-many Housewives could provide help services in housework in exchange for money.

-many employers they don't want a workforce older than 45-50 years, just in a few work sectors. We can help this majority of the workforce here as well.

-many people due to age or other reasons can no longer specialize in a new field at a slightly advanced age and even remain unemployed for a long time. Through these services they can round off their monthly income.

-Teenagers who have no income at all or for those who finish their studies and do not find jobs immediately or their parents cannot offer them more from a financial point of view. Through these services they can work for some extra income.

-exchange of experience or volunteering / many mature and young people start a career in a field and after a few years or more, realizing that they do not like what they chose in the past due to lack of experience or other reasons. We help them figure out what suits them by volunteering in a company for 1 , 2 or 3 days (trial days).

-can also pay extra income tax for the services you provide. You will also have a higher score when you have to declare extra income to access a bank loan or other financial service.

-We will also create a chat to be able to answer any question or information about almost anything.

                                       Our goal is set. Let’s reach it together

 

 

What our supporters are saying about us

 

                                     Spread the love. Let's make Celfiefriends Project happen!

 

 

 

                                                            Celfiefriends Project

                                                          Improve people's lives!

 

 

 

Celfiefriends Team,

Thank you very much for your support

story:
Now Available On Appstores

Final Indemand Days. Same day PERK Fulfillment 

 

One Stretch Goal Left, Two Already Reached!

 

Language Chat allows you to easily learn 14-16 languages 10x faster  by chatting, listening & speaking with the power of Cloud AI Technologies.
story_txt:
Now Available On AppstoresFinal Indemand Days. Same day PERK Fulfillment  One Stretch Goal Left, Two Already Reached! Language Chat allows you to easily learn 14-16 languages 10x faster  by chatting, listening & speaking with the power of Cloud AI Technologies. 
 Language learning shouldn't be difficult at all. Less than 10% of those who enrolled in a World Language could engage in conversation after they finished. 
 Some major problems of other tools 

Take Control



 
Language Chat combines the latest Cloud AI technologies from Microsoft Azure, Amazon, & Google Cloud to help you learn to speak languages from your first chat, without complexities. It’s the first user generated content language learning app built to super accelerate learning process with a higher retention.
Gain confidence by practicing with Cloud AI Speech Recognition and you’ll be amazed how fast and easy you would be speaking a new language.
 

  
Language Chat enables you to learn any language without forgetting. Learn from what you already know in your native language.
 

 

In three simple steps, you are in with fun. Absolutely the easiest way to learn a language with high retention.
 

 

 

 

Each user will get all available languages minus your native language, regardless of your reward. 


Language chat works with your First Language. First production release could support up to 7 First Languages with room for more in the future. The number of first languages will depend on our stretch goals reached.

 

This campaign has only three straightforward stretch goals to meet. Let's do it. We will definitely get there. Japanese, Korean, and Arabic are already in pipeline.

 


 

Your chats for a specific language can be saved  for offline access. This means that you can still access them without internet connection.

 
 Note that in order to use Cloud Speech Recognition from saved offline chats, internet is required.

Drill and test your pronunciations using cloud speech recognition for each chat message. It enables you to build your speaking confidence while chatting at the same time. 


 

 


Set your preferred nature native voices and automatically listen to natural native voice pronunciation of your chat and repeat along as many times as you want.  

 

Integrated neural bilingual dictionary is your friend!  Use bilingual dictionary available in each language you're on, to learn more synonyms and their natural native pronunciations.  

 

All your chats are automatically saved in the cloud for your future reference. You can also continue learning from where you stopped on each topic.  

 
 

Your personal word bank allows you to save words you wish not to forget from the neural bilingual dictionary. Each word comes with native audio pronunciation.  

 


Thanks for the enthusiasm. Back this project and  take advantage of our early bird lifetime subscription perk and save hugely; only available on Indiegogo Indemand.
Please note that lifetime subscription won't be offered once we launch. 

Language Chat project is ongoing even before the campaign and we will continue to work on it in order to deliver our promises on time. 

 
Supported Platforms

 Other Ways You Can Help 
Thanks for visiting our campaign page. Please help spread the word by sharing on Facebook or Twitter. 
 


 
Links

Website: http://www.languagechat.app 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Languagechat 
Download Media Kit 

Risks and challenges
No doubt, there is always a risk associated with any project. The current state of our app is a fully functioning private beta version. Due to intermittent changing nature of Cloud Infrastructures, we would like to make sure that all tools are updated to the latest version before production release. One of the major challenges we would likely face is in the area of translating our app to many languages (7+ languages). This will definitely depend on our stretch goal reached. We are already working on getting a competent service provider that could handle all translations just in time. However, we are absolutely sure of meeting the launch deadline.

story:
Overview

We need your help to create human connection through community focused student learning projects. Community Works Institute (CWI) supports educators in connecting their students to their community through real and impactful projects.

  • In these COVID times, our educators and students need real connection and community.
  • We work with educators to create student centered, community focused projects, for both virtual and in person applications.
  • Since 1995 CWI has provided educators with crucial training, resources, and connection opportunities, across the U.S. and internationally.
  • By making a tax deductible donation you are directly supporting our work with educators, schools, and community organizations. CWI is a 501(c)(3) Tax ID: 85-095624 contact us

Meeting the Challenges of 2020 and 2021

As you can imagine,this has been a year of extreme challenges for educators, students, and the non profits like CWI that support their work. Your support now is more important than ever.

  • We've quickly shifted our offerings to cutting edge virtual events that provide training to educators and give them access to inspired strategies and new thinking.
  • Since COVID struck in March 2020, we've supported more educators than ever before while bringing together exciting resource partner organizations.
  • Help us support and expand the connective training and resource events that we're able to offer educators at reduced or no cost.
  • Our Resource Partners Now Include: The Smithsonian; Local Learning; Kunhardt Film Foundation; Arizona State Museum; Project Green Schools; and others

What We Need & What You Get

  • Your support will make it possible for CWI to train, connect and inspire like minded educators right now, design engaging learning that builds community for students.
  • We'll keep you updated on the exciting work being done by our inspiring network of innovating educators!
  • Feel the satisfaction in knowing you're making a great difference for our teachers and students in these challenging times.

The Impact of Your Support

Now is the time to amplify human connection through community focused learning projects. During the challenging time of COVID our teachers and students need real inspiration and connection more than ever, and that's exactly what we support!

  • CWI Virtual Institutes for Educators, and our Spotlight series, seminars, and conferences

  • Community Works Journal: Digital Magazine for Educators

    Our flagship publication featuring reflective essays, curriculum and project exemplars

  • CWI Online Platform provides opportunities for educators to share their work while accessing a wealth of resources, including our video archive of webinars and workshops.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't make a financial contribution at the moment there are important ways you can join and help us:

  • Share our fundraising campaign with your networks and on social media.
  • As you'll see, IndieGoGo has excellent easy to use sharing tools!
  • contact us if you'd like to know more.

Join us today in making a contribution to our shared efforts to support teachers and students!

story:
Short Summary

  • Creator Shane McFarland, father of 4 young kids, waged a constant battle with his kids’ screen-time and online safety and set out to help millions of parents with kids 4-11 by developing a personalized single parental control and education app.  
  • Robert Pruitt, father of 2, faced the struggle of one already grown and a teen surrounded by a digital influence.
  • A single app that will help parents manage their kids' technology and incentivizes the child to complete lessons for points that can be spent to unlock more screen time or certain incentive apps that parents only want the child to access for limited amounts of time. All limits and app access are parent pre-approved.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Looking to raise $850,00 to keep our excellent marketing and developer team moving forward to achieve our dream of helping kids, hardworking parents and teachers.
  • We've committed to providing 35,000 FREE licenses to schools, who in turn, can choose to donate to families in need. 
  • If our full goal isn't met, we are still greatly appreciative and will put everything into the business while seeking out funding from our existing investors and venture capitalist. 

The Impact

  • This generation is known as "Generation Glass", digital devices are an extension of our kids identities. 
  • We are striving to get ahead of hours of meaningless time on devices and create a fun learning environment and create a peace of mind experience for parents. 
  • Math is an essential building block for kids, especially at an early age, this is why we chose this to be our first focus for Pre-K to 5th grade. 

Risks & Challenges

  • We've faced the challenge of missing our initial launch-date by a few weeks and school contacts have been a challenge as well as iOS being delayed until Fall. 
  • We are actively reaching out to schools in our local area as well as creating a plan to extend once successful! 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We appreciate everyone's support and would even like to be connected with educators across the country! 
  • We've already had of 250k viewers on our YouTube channel, please share! 
  • Like and share on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn! 
  • Please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

A single app that will help parents manage their kids' technology and incentivizes the child to complete lessons for points that can be spent to unlock more screen time or certain incentive apps that parents only want the child to access for limited amounts of time. Math is an essential building block for kids, especially at an early age, this is why we chose this to be our first focus for Pre-K to 5th grade.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate everyone's support and would even like to be connected with educators across the country!

Please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story: Bring to life my Master's degree project in Artistic Professions in Madrid. I need to pay the University fee, materials and accommodation while implementing and practising the quantum based methodology. Aiming to open an international art therapy clinic through my research, I am establishing a new narrative through quantum approach, DNA psychogenesis, epigenetics and art to serve to human physical and mental health to feel safer via exploring what it went through. This method is eligible to tackle from reason to cause consequences of the mental state which affects the physical, while the mind is artistically engaged. The modern medical culture looks in a new direction of the advancement of a new method where creativity and science are involved in linking interdisciplinary methodologies. Thank you for supporting my project.

story:
Short Summary

Who We Are:

Hello, my name is Melissa Quinones of ShopStickyRice.com and my husband, Daniel Quinones of LoveRoboughty.com.  We have been together over 9 years and in those years we have developed our craft in fine art, graphic design, apparel and fashion design, photography, styling, cinematography, film making and more.    In the process of becoming established in the industry from working with Disney, Nike, DC Shoes, Metal Mulisha, Harley Davidson and many more we have incorporated our talents and businesses to help others in their art careers through internship programs, youtube interview shows, written interviews and creating brands that help other non-profits in the arts, education and human trafficking issues to become sustainable and grow.
This Campaign:
The campaign we have started here on Indiegogo,  God's Land: Phase One is an extension of who we are and what we feel our purpose is.  It is a 5 part project that will give an already established non-profit school of faith a fresh look, more hands-on experiences and environments, remodeling and expansion of their already pristine credentials of 18 years of student, parent and community success.  We fully believe in God's Rainbow Christian Academy and felt the urgency to make this diamond in the rough shine in only the 2nd week of our visit here. We knew this place simply needed quality marketing, re-branding, and a thorough facelift.    After we began creating their new website we knew the world really wouldn't see everything we've experienced here in the children's smiles, great attitudes and sense of intelligence these students exuded.  We knew we had to create a short 'about' video for their site that would give a glimpse into this community.  One month later we had 3 short films and a release party to show the families our appreciation, there wasn't a dry eye in the love filled room at the ranch that day.
The Magnitude of Your Help:
With your help to share or fund this project is immeasurable!  We've heard first hand from the parents and graduated students how this school saved their family relationships, gave wisdom on raising their kids and how to see their communities as family because they first respond to them as if they were their own.  Not only is the education top notch but the ability to have a property that can allow for hands on projects is priceless. This school already has proven its ability to raise stellar students with the little they have stewarded thus far, imagine being a part the expansion to allow more students to experience Gods Rainbow and improve the quality of the already existing students learning environment with your contribution.

What We Need & What You Get

The Price Tag:
The land we are developing in totality is around 3 acres.  That is a lot of land we want to ensure each square foot is impactful in ever way possible.  As an old ranch  repairs are in order and those are all addressed through out our 5 phase plan.  Sure there are plenty of new child care programs and buildings popping up around God's Rainbow but none of them have the 18 year history, heart and vision that we do for Sugar Land like we do.  
The Perks:
When you give to this project you will be providing the children with a new butterfly garden, trails through a magical pine forest, an organic vegetable garden and a fruit and nut orchard.  You will also provide a parking lot that has been needed for parents to park and a driveway expansion for cars to pass each other safely.  Because the current sheds are decaying to environmental conditions a new shed will be erected to house the tools and supplies needed to maintain the land and provide the kids with the proper tools to do their projects.  We also plan to put in a new fence to keep the horses away from the new garden beds.  And last but not least to phase one, a new sign must be erected!  If you drove past this place you may not have known it existed and that is a shame! So we will be creating a new drive-thru sign that will be well lit and accommodate the new drive way expansion.  
Incomplete Funds Plan:
If we do not reach our goal we have prepared a priority list that would take care of the permits, contractors, utility vehicles and into materials to get the job started and sustainable for when we are capable for raising the full amounts needed.
What will you get?  
We are excited to give back a variety of perks to our donors.  Some of those included a DVD of the documentary we will be creating recording the progress of the land development and personal interviews with those who have attended the school, those who donate resources and those who volunteer their time to create this vision.  We will also have unique name plates made into the bricks, stones or wood that will be used in the structures of the park.  You can also anticipate a more unique perk like having a trail, park feature, or even a utility vehicle named after you or your family. At the finish of each phase, we will throw a release party on the developed land to commemorate each phase milestone which will also be one of the perks you can look forward to!

The Impact

Impacting Others:
This project will make a huge impact on the community of Sugar Land, Houston and the world by creating a place where relationships grow and thrive for the higher education and hands-on experience for the children.  Not only will the students be more engaged but there will be lasting life lessons infused in every moment we build together with a life long place dedicated to bringing people together.  Until now we have not seen a place that has a botanical garden, children park, wildlife studies, organic garden, and school all emerge into one place of tranquility for miles around, this is a unique opportunity to be a part of with people who truly care about community and healthy lifestyles.  
Our Track Record:
God's Rainbow Christian Academy's 18+ years in Houston combined with our 9+ years of bringing people together through education, creativity, working alongside skilled craftsmen and builders in Los Angeles we are confident we can bring this vision to life with your support. What makes this tangible to those who are not located Houston is our ongoing efforts to keep you updated via our social sites and videos and the positive results in the hearts we shared time with here on the ranch.  This project will last beyond our years and continue to keep giving back and shaping the future of generations to come!
Risks & Challenges:
In any project there are risks and obstacles but with the years of research we have done and put into practice in our daily lives, skilled manpower, and those who have expressed their eagerness to support, we are positive we can make this dream a reality.  We are prepared to continue our mission with excellence in fund raising, manual labor and social perseverance both on and offline.

Other Ways You Can Help:

One thing that makes video viral is the buzz created by those who watch and share media around the worldwide web.  That's where YOU come into play, it doesn't cost you anything but time to re-post what we are doing here and it leaves a big impact to those around you who may be able to get more involved.  
Another way…
 ...to donate is through our registry on our website which allows you to pick an item needed, purchase and send it to the Ranch!  We will take a photo of the item when we receive it and post a thank you though our Instagram! 
Let's put our hands together and make some noise for a brighter future!
story_txt:

story:
The Grand Project

A Park Above is No Ordinary Park, It's an Extraordinary Park.
The Rotary Club of Rio Rancho is asking for donations to purchase and install a shade structure for the amphitheater in this Community All Abilities Park.

The Vision

Imagine a park with kids of all abilities playing together building healthy relationships. Imagine a park with fun activities that are finally accessible to those who could not access them before.
The 6 acre park that is under construction in Rio Rancho, New Mexico has been fully designed as a universal accessible all-inclusive play experience. Typically children with developmental, cognitive, or physical disabilities do not have the opportunity to experience the joy of playing on a playground, yet play matters. The greatest issue for persons with disabilities is social segregation. Play is a "social experience" as well as a "cognitive" experience that is essential for early childhood development. The social experience must be available to everyone.
This inclusive park will provide a venue for exercise and social interaction that is currently not available in this region. The uniquely configured playscape will include individual areas that appeal to children with autism, Down's syndrome, learning, visual and hearing impairments, physical disabilities, and children that are socially challenged. These areas of play will be designed to promote socialization and development of all children in their own unique way.

The Rotary Club of Rio Rancho Community Service Project

The genesis for this project started 6 years ago by Jennie Riedl who was the Community Service Chairperson for the Rotary Club of Rio Rancho. In cooperation with the city of Rio Rancho, 6 acres was determined for the site. The park overall has a butterfly theme, and in fact looking overhead has the entire shape of a butterfly. The park is currently 95% complete in Phase 1. Over 80 local companies have donated time, materials, and labor to get the park developed to where it is today.


Many Unique Features

Phase 1 of the park includes the majority of the playing area. Wheelchair basketball courts and equipment that will accommodate wheelchairs are abundant. The attention to detail is incredible in the design and layout. Able bodied and disable bodied children will have the ability to play together like never before.

Much of the main play area has the play equipment installed. The ground all around the park will be finished with artificial turf in the near future. The park also features a water play area with pressure sensitive zones to activate water sprays. A music educational feature will also be a popular destination. The entire park is easily accessible to everyone.


 The Rotary Amphitheater Fundraiser

The centerpiece of the Phase 2 construction plan is for the Rotary Amphitheater. This 32 by 30 foot grand stage and performance area will encourage families to gather together to hear and watch performances from within the community. The Rotary Club of Rio Rancho is committed to raise the $30,000 needed for the purchase and installation of the amphitheater shade structure. As of April 2015, the club has raised $21,000 towards this goal.


How You Can Help

Your kind donations will all contribute towards the construction of the amphitheater shade structure. The Rio Rancho Rotary Foundation which is promoting this fundraiser is a non-profit 501(c)3 public foundation. There are various perks available and any donations are greatly appreciated. Visit the A Park Above Facebook page for current construction updates.

story:
Short Summary

The past and current history of Germany's relationship with Africa and Afro-Germans in contemporary German society.

“THE AFRO-GERMANS”

OVERVIEW

  In 1985, during her days as a visiting professor at the Free University in Berlin, poet/activist Audre Lorde sparked a movement which continues to ripple through Germany today.

  It was during one of her lectures, that she asked the White women who had attended, to leave the room. She asked that the few Black women attending to stay and not leave until they had spoken to at least one other Black women in the room and  agreed to meet again.

  She challenged Black Germans- particularly women- to  not let others define their identity and to organize themselves. She also knew that most Afro-Germans were fractured and came from different parts of the African continent and

raised in different parts of Germany, which did not lend itself to organizing.

  Audre Lorde’s experience in both the Civil Rights and Women’s movement gave her insight to the struggle of Afro-Germans. She understood those differences and encouraged them. while at the same time, recognizing the commonality of

their overall German and African experience. “You are not alone”, she said.

  She also encouraged the women to work together, to make themselves visible, to raise their voices...each in their very own way.

  This resulted in the book “Showing Our Colors: Afro-German Wome Speak Out”, an anthology of multi-generational Afro-German women who tell the  story of their lives. It was in “Showing Our Colors” that the women first identified

themselves as Afro-German- an earlier concept introduced by Audre Lorde who said Black Germans were a ”hyphenated people......., sharing a double culture, a double life.”

  From the energy and contacts needed to complete such a work, the women began to organize even further.  First there was the ISD-The Initiative of Black Germans, which has sprung up chapters in every major German city. Then came a

sister organization, ADEFRA. This in turn sparked the publication of “Afrekete” a small newspaper which served as a vehicle to express the lives of Afro-Germans.

  The late Afro-German poet May Akim summed it up by saying, “ The book was the start of the Afro-German movement in a certain way. Since 1986, the Black German associations have developed”.

  As I delved more into the history of Afro-Germans, I began to understand the impact of Audre Lorde on the modern-day Afro-German movement and wanted the book’s title to include the essence of her  attitude that helped shaped thatmovement. .

Compared to other minorities such as the Turks, who number close to 2 million of the 82 million white German population, Africans in Germany comprise less than 2 percent of the total population, estimated between 300,000 and 500,000 and are concentrated in big cities like Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, Munich and Frankfurt.


The first German traders, missionaries and travelers went to Africa around 1600. The Brandenburg African Company-established in 1682- created small settlements in what are now the West African countries of Guinea and Ghana. The traders and others brought Africans back to Europe to work as aides for households or as laborers for businesses.

  During the early 18th century, Anton Wilhelm Amo, a Ghanian who had been sponsored by a German Duke, became the first African to attend and graduate from a European University and would later teach philosophy.

  Under the ”Iron and Blood” philosophy of Otto von Bismarck, the modern nation-state of Germany was forged in 1871, becoming a leading and influential power of the often warring European countries.

  Unlike many of the older European nations, Germany was a johnny-come-lately in establishing colonies.  The Berlin Conference of 1884 allowed Germany to participate in the European colonization of Africa and it eventually established African colonies in  Cameroon, Togo, Tanzania, Burundi, Namibia, parts of Botswana,Kenya and Mozambique.


Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
