You can also contribute at various levels to the Giving Wings program and help give My Wings to children in need using the Giving Wings Perks on the right.
You are welcome to select and purchase multiple Perks; however, each Perk requires its own transaction. If you'd like to claim multiple Perks, please make a new contribution for each Perk. After the completion of the My Wings funding campaign, a questionnaire will be sent to contributors asking which style and what size shirts they desire, and to what address they want the shirts delivered. Contributors to the Giving Wings program will select in the questionnaire which organization they would like to support.
Giving Wings contributions will fund the production and delivery of My Wings shirts to our growing list of partners in the Giving Wings program. Initially Shriners Hospital for Children® and Pay It Forward Sweden will gift the shirts to benefit the children they serve. With your help we can expand the Giving Wings program to include other organizations around the world that support children in their right to a safe, healthy, and playful childhood.Please contribute now by selecting your desired “Perk” listed to the right.  What’s Included My Wings are made of 100% organic and Fairtrade cotton, with digitally printed polyester chiffon wings and sleeves. They are produced by our Fairtrade manufacturers that certify compliance with specific environmental, labor, and developmental standards.

Every My Wings shirt design is an original work of art. The wings are stunningly beautiful designs that depict butterfly, dragon, and fairy wings. The printing is on the front side of the wing to give maximum color vibrancy to each wing design; the back side is not as bright as the front. 
 

 The Activity Booklet and My Wings Card
Every My Wings shirt comes with an activity booklet and My Wings card that help develop confidence, self-esteem, and creative exploration. These activities are designed for adults and children to play with together, fostering quality bonding time.
 

 


 

Activity Booklet and My Wings Cards available in English and Swedish
 
How Funds Will Be Used

We will fund our first production order, build an eCommerce web site for future orders, expand the Giving Wings program with additional supportive organizations and marketing, and launch our global online marketing campaign promoting My Wings and the Giving Wings program.
 
 
Our First Giving Wings Children Support Organizations
We are pleased to be partnering with:

The Shriners Hospital for Children® Northern California
Pay It Forward Foundation of Sweden

We are currently developing relationships with other organizations that can help more children around the world.
 
  
The My Wings Story
 
BY THE FOUNDER OF MY WINGS
 
My Wings began to take life in 2007, when I was a music teacher of young children, after graduating from U.C. Santa Cruz with a bachelor’s degree in community studies and minors in business management and social sciences, with a heavy focus on creative arts.
It was my passion to awaken the children’s curiosity and musical gifts at such a young age. At one point during the classes we would dance with scarves that through their imagination became wings. I noticed that as they took flight they would all lighten up, their innate joy would kick in, and their playful confidence would allow them to stretch into new areas of development and learning. Especially moving for me was seeing the children with physical or emotional challenges opening up with greater confidence through playful flying. I believe that the wings reminded the children of the feeling of freedom that is already alive within them, and that their dreams are possible and within their reach. Just like the freedom the crawling caterpillar must feel as it becomes a butterfly.  
I spent the next 6 years traveling and exploring community around the world. Though I saw many beautiful sights, I also saw a lot of children suffering. I felt a desire to do something to help these children. In a moment of inspiration I had a vision of beautiful shirts with wings for children to help them connect with their power and freedom within. This reminded me of  my early flying-with-scarves experiences during the children’s music classes. I looked to buy shirts with wings for the children, to remind them that they can grow, achieve their dreams, and soar in life. To my astonishment I could find no children’s shirts with wings like I envisioned. In addition to the winged shirts, the idea to include stories and activities were included to help strengthen the children’s “inner wings,” aiming to nurture empowering qualities to help children fly their highest and shine their brightest. 
In early 2014 after moving to Sweden I won several contests for business start up support based on My Wings. I received  business development training and business mentorship, and it was finally time for My Wings to take flight. I gathered artists and designers and created the first My Wings designs, and made my initial prototypes. Children absolutely loved these creatively playful shirts and I believed they could help all children, the fortunate and the less fortunate as well. Thus was born the My Wings business model, which includes the Giving Wings program that gifts My Wings to children with special needs. 
This Indiegogo campaign is my first request for money to help support the My Wings dream. I have self-funded thousands of dollars to get to this point, but now need help from others to take My Wings and the Giving Wings program to children around the world. I humbly and respectfully ask for your help to reach our goal and to uplift children and help them to soar in life. Thank you!
Lee Giove
Founder, DesignerMy Wings, Giving Wings
 

 
How You Can Help
Beside your generous contribution to My Wings and the Giving Wings program, you can help us spread the word. If our program and story inspire you, please tell your friends, colleagues, and organizations that know children that could use the gift of My Wings. You can use the Indiegogo share tools provided. Please contact us here if you have any ideas to help us grow into our vision. Thank you!
 

FAQ

Q: How can we get in touch with your team?
A: We welcome you to visit our website www.My-Wings.com and if you have any questions regarding My Wings or our Indiegogo campaign, please contact us here. 
Q: I'm having trouble claiming a Perk. Who should I reach out to?
A: Email: support@indiegogo.com
Q: How do I upgrade my perk?
A: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756
 
Q: How can I make multiple Perk purchases or contributions?
A: You are welcome to select and purchase multiple Perks; however, each Perk requires its own transaction. If you'd like to claim multiple Perks, please make a new contribution for each Perk.
Q: How do I select the design and styles of shirts I want?
A:  After the completion of the My Wings funding campaign, a questionnaire will be sent to you asking which style and what size shirt(s) you desire, and to what address you want them delivered.
Q: How do I know which size to order?
A:  After the completion of the funding campaign, a questionnaire will be sent out to gather order information. Included in this questionnaire will be a detailed size chart for your reference.
Q: When will my shirts be delivered?
A: My Wings shirts will be delivered in September 2016 or before.
Q: What comes with each shirt?
A: Each shirt comes with a My Wings card and Activity Booklet.
Q: How do I choose the language option for the accompanying materials?
A: After the campaign completion you will receive a questionnaire in which you will choose your preferred language.  
Q: Can I give a contribution to support this campaign without requiring a Perk in return?
A: Yes, absolutely. Simply click on the “Contribute Now” button located just above the column of listed perks. In the Perk field it will say, “No perk, I just want to contribute.” You enter your contribution amount and continue to payment.  Thank you for your support!
Q: If I want a refund, how do I do this?
A: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367
 
Q: Can I exchange/return my My Wings shirt?
A:  Yes, contact us for more information. 
 
Q: How do I select which organization will receive the My Wings shirts from my contribution:
A: After the campaign completion, contributors to the Giving Wings program will receive a questionnaire and select which organization they would like to support.
Q: How many shirts does my contribution to the Giving Wings program provide? 
A: The retail price for a My Wings shirt is $72. The My Wings company gives 1 shirt to a child through our partner organizations for every $27 donated.
Q: Can I donate shirts to an organization of my choice or does it have to be the official Giving Wings partner organizations?
A: Giving Wings contributions will be delivered through our partnering organizations. If you have suggestions or represent an organization that serves children with special needs and would like to partner in the Giving Wings program, please let us know by contacting us here.
Q: How can I become a retail seller or how can I help get My Wings into a retail store near me?
A: Please contact or refer to us here.

story:
What is Evolved Ministry?

  • Evolved Ministry is an exclusive online energy school that teaches beings how to master themselves and represents the unconditional love force. You can find our website here: EvolvedMinistry.com
  • Self-mastery is all about learning to hone your physical body, mind and soul by being in harmony with yourself and the universe. Your results are achieved through the intention of unconditional love in your practice. 

  • Our goal is to raise enough money to purchase a new camera to bring the highest quality resolution in our videos that pertain to self-mastery education.
  • Your donation means a lot to us and in return for donating $20, we will give you access to one set of courses at our school, this is typically valued at about $40 or higher. A $35 donation will get you access to 2 sets of courses, this is about an $80+ value. We also have the option of donating $1 if you can't afford to give much but still want to help and we've also created a perk of 2 courses + 1 Skype call for $50 donations.

The Camera

  • The camera we are looking to purchase is the Panasonic HC-X 1000; below is a video of its amazing capabilities. This video does not belong to us nor do we own rights to any of the content in this video. We are merely sharing it to show you how awesome this camera is. This video is actually by the company who makes this camera, Panasonic. 
  • Nice, right?

  • The cost for the Panasonic HC-X 1000 can be found online; below is a clickable link for the camera on Amazon.com
    -Panasonic HC-X 1000 on Amazon.com-
  • As you can see, the camera goes for about $3,000. We need to raise $3,300 because IndieGoGo charges a fee of about 10% to use this site as a service. (10% of of 3000 is 300, thus 3000 + 300 = 3300)
  • We have about 200+ students on our site right now, if almost everyone were to donate even just $20 today, we could raise the funds needed in one day.

Meet the Evolved Ministry Team

<<- Michael Grubb - CEO & Creator of Evolved Ministry, Head Instructor ->>
<<- Liset Santos - Administrator, Self-Mastery Instructor ->>
<<- Daniel Atlas - Self-Mastery & Gardening Instructor ->>
<<- Joel Jacobson - Self-Mastery & Nutrition Instructor ->>
    • What we teach is the real deal and is imperative to learn to reach the next level of evolution for mankind. With your participation and willingness to and learn, you will discover your maximum potential. Take a look below at some our vids and see for yourself what you are capable of...
    •  Here are some videos that we have available on YouTube that can give you a very general idea of what we teach & what self-mastery entails


    • You can find out more about us on our website --> www.EvolvedMinistry.com
    • Our Facebook Page -->  www.facebook.com/SelfMasteryEvolvedMinistry
    • YouTube --> www.youtube.com/MichaelGrubb


    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Share this page on your social media platform of choice! There are plenty of share tools on this very page that allow you to share this at the click of a button. 
    • Make a donation of your choice. Even if you are not interested in taking any of our courses and your donation is under $20, it will still be much appreciated and will help us get closer towards our goal.




    *******PLEASE READ*******
    If you make a donation you MUST check the email you used while making a donation for further instruction from us. Please allow us up to 24-48 for a response. If you need to contact us, our email is: EvolvedMinistry177@gmail.com

story:
Hi Everybody!

My name is Duncan and I live in England. Since 2006 I have been teaching spoken English to the world via YouTube. I have been doing this on my own and in my own time for free. I do not charge anything to anyone for my material. During the past nine years I have helped many thousands of people of all ages around the world improve their spoken English. My lessons are video based, which allows me to make them in a fun and creative way, using vivid imagery. Virtually all of my video lessons are subtitled. Of course all of this producing takes time...and there are overheads (running costs) to meet. I have worked abroad as an English teacher and spent four years teaching oral English in China. 

Popularity...

Thousands of students in over 125 countries now follow my lessons, which means that I must devote more of my time to this venture. I have already invested a large sum of my own money to create a studio and purchase equipment so as to produce as many new lessons as possible. My subscriber base is growing. Right now it stands at over 400.000. In the future I would like to expand this virtual classroom and increase the output, ensuring that many more people will benefit from these free video lessons. 

The world of English is a fun and exciting place.

There is no doubt that these days the English language is widely used. It has become an international language. Having the ability to communicate in English can really open doors for people of all ages. Your help will allow many more people to take advantage of the various life-changing opportunities that the English language can offer.

story:
Summary

As a Professor teaching at a #1 ranked MBA program I noticed an interesting trend: increasingly, already well-educated professionals like physicians, attorneys, engineers, scientists, etc. were taking time away from their professional work to enroll in an MBA program.  It occurred to me that there's a huge potential audience of professionals who would see the benefit of learning the fundamentals of business without having to incur the expense and opportunity cost of getting an MBA.  MBA in a Day, published in 2004, (same year of Google IPO and “pre-Facebook”) has successfully met that need.  More than a decade later, it's time for MBA in a Day 2.0, an important update to my best-selling book.

What We Need & What You Get

Over the past year I have researched, written, woven-in and updated the content of business fundamentals for MBA in A Day 2.0.

85,000 words and 303 pages later, the draft is ready for final editing, and for the creation of engaging graphics, book production and distribution.

In today's disruptive market for books and intellectual content, it's all about generating awareness, interest and action to engage an audience and share with them meaningful work.  Most of the funding will be dedicated to developing, nurturing and sharing this new work that has a large audience and a big market opportunity.  Here is a breakdown of the use of funds:

  • $2,000 for final editing  ($.02 per word)
  • $2,000 for cover design, charts, graphs, design consulting
  • $3,000 for formatting and layout, final production version
  • $6,000 for paid search: Google AdWords, Facebook and Twitter
  • $6,000 for social media campaign support, blogging, social media awareness

The Impact

Organizations, and their leaders, are increasingly aware of the need to professionalize the way they are delivering their services or producing their product. This trend is affecting heretofore “not-a-business” organizations like nonprofits, hospitals, scientific research laboratories, etc. MBA in a Day 2.0 will provide important and necessary principles and concepts of business for leaders to apply in these organizations.

Sales of 15,000+ copies of the original 2004 version (available only in hardback at a $29) has validated market viability.  Having successfully obtained a reversion of the original book's publishing rights, a sub-$20 revision MBA in a DAY 2.0  will appeal to a wide and deep market.

Risks & Challenges

Today, it’s a risky environment in the world of content creation, marketing and distribution.  We live in a dynamic, sometimes chaotic world of information that’s shared in nanoseconds and often, in 140 characters or less. 

The greatest challenge will be to find a way to gain awareness, access and action to the MBA in a DAY 2.0 reader.  It’s a crowded, noisy marketplace.  The marketing plan budget, while generous, will need thoughtful development and effective execution—it’s a challenge that I am confident to meet and to be successful in sharing my work.

story:
TESL-EJ Needs Your Help

TESL-EJ is an open-access, free, peer-reviewed academic journal for English as a Second or Foreign Language professionals (tesl-ej.org, ISSN 1072-4303). We have offered free access to all for more than 20 years. 

For these twenty years, the editors have funded the journal out of pocket. Although advertisers approach us constantly, we want to remain free of advertising. We also don't believe in charging academics to publish their work. 

Therefore, we're coming to you for help.

What We Need  

We are hoping to receive funding for these projects: 

  • fully fund our main website and our submissions website for years to come
  • hire a designer to update our look (badly needed!)
  • purchase updated software for creating PDFs and e-format works we publish, such as textbooks or nonfiction works
  • expand our ability to publish books and monographs

What You Get  

We will acknowledge all donors on our 'donor page' in the journal. Donors will be designated as "TESL-EJ  Champions" if they donate $50 US or more. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot offer money, remember we are always looking for volunteers. None of our staff are paid--not the editors, copy-editors, or reviewers. If you have skills you can lend, write us at editor@tesl-ej.org.

story:
There are a million websites out there that do just about everything. How many of them will show you how to make a fortune and have fun doing it?

Since 1983 the Owner/Founder has taken many investment, trading and money management seminars with the best in the business, occasionally attending those seminars with hedge fund professionals. As a stock, options and futures broker he generated extraordinary returns for his clients. CAUTION: Options and futures are too risky for the vast majority of investors and should be avoided. That said...

Would you like to be a big hit with your friends and associates, pick the best stocks to buy, when to buy and just as important -- know when to sell. Additionally, you will always know what the stock market and the economy is doing and why.

  • Ever watch a stock run up significantly just to watch the profits disappear?
  • Wish you could learn the A to Z of investing at your own pace in simple terms?
  • Wish you could get some help watching the market and your stocks everyday?
  • Wish you could get all of this without the flash & confusion at a low price? 
  • Would you like to know more about the market than your financial adviser?
Our four (4) "Model Portfolios" will teach subscribers the What, When and How to Buy and Sell stocks of all kinds. Our "Market Comment" reports will be emailed every morning before the opening and every evening after the market closes. We live in a global market so the morning report is more important than ever.

We will give subscribers insights that are rarely talked about; not the bull you'll hear from the financial pundits who are about as right as a broken clock. The buy and hold cliche sucks when your stock or the market is down 20 to 50%...

Our long-term "Market Comments" dated May 2015 suggested interest rates would stay low for the foreseeable future and the Fed would be making a mistake to raise them. Again, the pundits suggested otherwise and were wrong. How did we know? We subscribe to the best economic research group in the country. (see www.learn2invest247.com, then Market Comments then Long-Term)

Our subscribers get these benefits and much, much more for around $15 a month.

If you select the $15 "Perk" on the right side of this page and you will get a free subscription for one (1) year valued at $215, and for the $25 "Perk" you will get a free two (2) year subscription valued at $430. Perks range from $5 to $100...

How do the best performing money managers invest?

They buy or create the best research and then use "If-This-Then-That" algorithms or technical analysis to time the buy and sell orders of growing stocks. So do we!!! We spend thousands each year on the best research then we apply our proprietary analysis to create model portfolios for our subscribers; all for around $15 a month.

Few of us have the time it takes to find the best answers to "What to Buy," "When to Buy" and "When to Sell." If you agree that time is scarce, you will find our website is designed to make your life easier when it comes to investing, wealth building and/or understanding what your investment professional is doing with your money.

Why do the “Rich-Get-Richer?”

Because they invest in their own education, their own businesses, public stocks, real estate and so on… Get richer – invest in your education: Check out our "nearly complete" investing website, www.learn2invest247.com, for the future in investing education and advice.

  • Every investor is a trader the minute they place an order to buy or sell a stock. How long do you hold an investment before selling it? Hopefully, before it starts to decline any meaningful amount… or, when there is a superior investment to replace it! Our expertise is market timing - avoid the next 20 to 50% drop!
  • Don’t know anything about investing? Don’t know where to start? You’ve come to the right place! Afraid to invest in individual stocks, but have heard mutual funds and ETFs are safer – we cover them too and actually provide a portfolio of ETFs, including an inverse market ETF to hedge against market declines. 
  • Don’t have much money now, but would like to get started today… We have a “Free for the New/Small Investor” section with simple instructions on how to begin investing in the future growth of America. You can to begin building your wealth with very little money. Then study our site at your own pace while you’re “in-the-market.” It will be fun!
  • You're experienced, but would like to learn more methods to increase your profits. We will build on the free “textbook like” pages by teaching you more ways to analyze the stock market, as a whole, and individual stocks specifically within the "Membership" subscription section and related email broadcasts.
  • Approximately 70% of a stocks move is attributed to the direction of the broad market. Our stock futures trading expertise gives us an edge with market timing giving our subscribers a hedging technique against market declines.
  • Within the Membership Subscription section we will teach you, in real-time, the techniques of fundamental and technical analysis we use.
  • Subscribers will also receive stock buy/sell alerts by email broadcasts “24/7” along with stock analysis changes within our diversified model portfolios.
  • Eighty percent our website (the static text book part) is free to everyone. Our subscription section is just $17.95 per month (easily discounted to $14.95). Plus, we will provide an opportunity to promote our site and not only get our subscription for free, but be paid a generous monthly royalty payment.
Who we are and what we are about?

Our Founder is a former commercial banker, stock broker and futures trader. In 2010 a devastating accident led to a long hospital stay and his losing everything, including being able to return to work full time in an office environment.

That led to using his engineering degree and his investment/trading experience to develop investing and trading algorithms that produce extraordinary results in simulated trading/investing. These algorithms are not a result of back testing or optimization and are robust enough to work in virtually every market environment.

The extraordinary algorithm performance led to the creation of our website.

Our website, www.learn2invest247.com is nearing completion and we need your help in finishing and launching the project.

These final programming steps include integrating and completely automating the subscription section, signups, cancellations, credit card processing, search engine optimization "SEO" and six (6) months of targeted marketing.

This site will be the best of its kind within two years and each and every contributor will be able to claim the success of learn2invest247.com is due in no small part to their contributions and generosity.  Not to mention the free subscriptions.

Our Mission

Our mission is to help our subscribers become highly skilled at making money in the stock market. We know the investment and trading methodologies that the best performing professionals use to select which stocks to buy, sell and hold.

Subscription members will receive instructional updates by email as they occur – not just once a week or once a month. These reports detail both fundamental and technical analysis online and by email. 
 
Our Vision

Money isn’t the root of all evil – it’s just a tool. In the right hands money can be used to help many of our neighbors and our nation – philanthropy, charity and endowments. Americans are the most generous, giving people on earth. Our vision and desire is to teach wealth building for everyone’s benefit.

How we plan to achieve our goals to help everyone:

  • We will focus on what matters most and avoid the bells and whistles that may lead to confusion and a general waste of time. Flashy sites are cool, but superior content makes more money.
  • There are far more expensive investment websites, that offer far less in teaching the WHAT, WHEN and HOW to invest and build wealth.
  • We will recommend financial websites that we use ourselves and feel offer great value. In fact, we will spend over $1,000 a month for fundamental research reports and apply our technical analysis to pick the best price to buy the best stocks - all for just $17.95 per month easily discounted to $14.95/mo.
  • Our low cost subscription includes everything for stock investing – no up selling or marketing gimmicks.
  • We will offer more for less… Cost is an essential component to success; therefore we offer our monthly subscription for about the cost of one (1) average employee hour.
  • To fulfill our purpose and goals we must be ever improving and innovating. We plan to develop videos on how to use the BEST technology for investing and trading profitably – to work smarter, not harder. The founder has a degree in engineering where efficiency is a major focus.
  • Our Number 1 Goal is to be Ranked Number 1 in newsletter performance, in terms of Return On Investment (“ROI”), for both the short and long-term.
  • Our Number 2 Goal is to be the largest “stock investing” website globally. Specifically, to have between 500,000 and 1 million subscribers within 10 years of launch – with millions more using our free services. Once we have the #1 documented tract record, with the easiest to understand teaching methods, becoming the largest financial wealth training site will be automatic.
Other companies are promoting programs that run hundreds of technical studies; most are worthless. Using these programs to optimize back testing is not only a waste of time, but hazardous. Investment professionals know exactly what I mean.

Our goals also include being the Number 1 site for independent financial advisers seeking low cost and a laser like focus on simplicity and ROI results from a stock investing and trading resource. Our market timing expertise will be indispensable.

In the book authored by Stephen R. Covey, “The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People,” habit number 5 is: “Think Win-Win. People who think win-win have a frame of mind and heart that seeks mutual benefit and respect in all interactions. They think in terms of abundance and opportunity, in terms of we not me.” This is what we are all about – if we help you win, we win.

The founder is a devoted Christian who believes in helping his fellow man and the principles of charity, high moral ethics, along with sowing and reaping. We pray this website serves those principles well…

Use of Funds/Contributions:

We will complete and automate features of the website that are labor intensive, including programming the dynamic subscription “Portfolio Model” pages, revise initial site design with a more updated look and feel, and put the complete package together using the subscription focused web services companies below:

Recurly.com – Totally automated program for subscription sign-ups, cancellations and credit card collections. These automated features will significantly increase operating efficiencies and reduce long-term expenses. Global subscribers can pay in their local currency or US dollars.

Leaddyno.com – Totally automated marketing programs working integrating with Recurly.com and MailChimp.com.

MailChimp.com – Totally automated email program integrated to work seamlessly with Recurly and Leaddyno. 

Webceo.com – Search Engine Optimization "SEO" online marketing platform.

Finance the first six (6) month fee of the above web integrations along with a six (6) month "Pay-Per-Click" initial marketing campaign.

Hire the initial staff of two full-time employees, one (1) with analytical and report writing skills and one (1) with web development and maintenance skills. The Founder/CEO will not take a salary until we reach 1,500 subscribers.

There are a million websites out there that do just about everything. How many of them will show you how to make a fortune and have fun doing it?
Since 1983 the Owner/Founder has taken many investment, trading and
money management seminars with the best in the business, occasionally attending
those seminars with hedge fund professionals. As a stock, options and futures broker he generated extraordinary returns for his clients. CAUTION: Options and futures are too risky for the vast majority of investors and should be avoided. That said...Would you like to be a big hit with your friends and associates, pick the best stocks to buy, when to buy and just as important -- know when to sell. Additionally, you will always know what the stock market and the economy is doing and why. Ever watch a stock run up significantly just to watch the profits disappear?Wish you could learn the A to Z of investing at your own pace in simple terms?Wish you could get some help  watching the market and your stocks everyday?Wish you could get all of this without the flash & confusion at a low price?  Would you like to know more about the market than your financial adviser? Our four (4) "Model Portfolios" will teach subscribers the What, When and How to Buy and Sell stocks of all kinds. Our "Market Comment" reports will be emailed every morning before the opening and every evening after the market closes. We live in a global market so the morning report is more important than ever. We will give subscribers insights that are rarely talked about; not the bull you'll hear from the financial pundits who are about as right as a broken clock. The buy and hold cliche sucks when your stock or the market is down 20 to 50%... Our long-term "Market Comments" dated May 2015 suggested interest rates would stay low for the foreseeable future and the Fed would be making a mistake to raise them. Again, the pundits suggested otherwise and were wrong. How did we know? We subscribe to the best economic research group in the country. (see www.learn2invest247.com, then Market Comments then Long-Term) Our subscribers get these benefits and much, much more for around $15 a month. If you select the $15 "Perk" on the right side of this page and you will get a free subscription for one (1) year valued at $215, and for the $25 "Perk" you will get a free two (2) year subscription valued at $430. Perks range from $5 to $100...How do the best performing money managers invest?They buy or create the best research and then use "If-This-Then-That" algorithms or technical analysis to time the buy and sell orders of growing stocks. So do we!!! We spend thousands each year on the best research then we apply our proprietary analysis to create model portfolios for our subscribers; all for around $15 a month.Few of us have the time it takes to find the best answers to "What to Buy," "When to Buy" and "When to Sell." If you agree that time is scarce, you will find our website is designed to make your life easier when it comes to investing, wealth building and/or understanding what your investment professional is doing with your money. Why do the “Rich-Get-Richer?” Because they invest in their own education, their own businesses, public stocks, real estate and so on… Get richer – invest in your education: Check out our "nearly complete" investing website, www.learn2invest247.com, for the future in investing education and advice.Every investor is a trader the minute they place an order to buy or sell a stock. How long do you hold an investment before selling it? Hopefully, before it starts to decline any meaningful amount… or, when there is a superior investment to replace it! Our expertise is market timing - avoid the next 20 to 50% drop!
Don’t know anything about investing? Don’t know where to start? You’ve come to the right place! Afraid to invest in individual stocks, but have heard mutual funds and ETFs are safer – we cover them too and actually provide a portfolio of ETFs, including an inverse market ETF to hedge against market declines.  
Don’t have much money now, but would like to get started today… We have a “Free for the New/Small Investor” section with simple instructions on how to begin investing in the future growth of America. You can to begin building your wealth with very little money. Then study our site at your own pace while you’re “in-the-market.” It will be fun!
You're experienced, but would like to learn more methods to increase your profits. We will build on the free “textbook like” pages by teaching you more ways to analyze the stock market, as a whole, and individual stocks specifically within the "Membership" subscription section and related email broadcasts.
Approximately 70% of a stocks move is attributed to the direction 
of the broad market. Our stock futures trading expertise gives us an 
edge with market timing giving our subscribers a hedging technique against market declines.
Within the Membership Subscription section we will teach you, in real-time, the techniques of fundamental and technical analysis we use.

Our subscription section is just $17.95 per month (easily discounted to $14.95). Plus, we will provide an opportunity to promote our site and not only get our subscription for free, but be paid a generous monthly royalty payment.

story:
We are seeking funding to complete InsightSTEM's project to write the "Five Pillars of Family Science" book, and get it to publication! This book, authored by InsightSTEM President, Dr Jake Noel-Storr, will encourage and enable parents and guardians to bring genuine science exploration to their whole family.

In the Beginning...

From the moment we open our eyes, we begin to explore our world. Through our youth this curiosity grows with the guidance of parents, siblings, and loved ones. Richard Feynman, a Nobel Prize winning physicist and popularizer of science, once reminisced about his father’s role in fueling his passion for science:

 “A thing that was very important about my father was not the facts but the process. How we find out…that’s the kind of guy he was. I don’t think he ever successfully went to college. However, he did teach himself a great deal. He read a lot. He liked the rational mind, and liked those things which could be understood by thinking. So it’s not hard to understand I got interested in science”

His father’s fascination with the universe directly fueled Feynman’s curiosity – developing one of the world’s greatest physicists to have ever lived. Families Matter.

Columbia University Obervatory... where I began my work in Family Science

Hi, I am Dr Jake Noel-Storr, President of InsightSTEM. 

As an astrophysics PhD student in New York City over 15 years ago, I began working on Family Science programs to help families engage and share in the excitement that I have for exploring science knowledge. But during these programs as I looked around the room, I quickly noticed that these programs engaged only the kids, and not the family as a whole. Parents sat around at the back of the room drinking coffee, chatting with each other, and generally not taking part in any of the learning activities. Kids attending were all from families who regularly went to science centers, planetariums, nature centers, and zoos. Often, their parents were STEM professionals themselves.

Though these events were great, and had fantastic reviews, we added less value than we hoped, and families were missing the opportunity to explore science together. Families exploring science together is surely the point of family science... and I became really passionate about making that possible!

From that point on I knew that things had to change -- and I worked hard to create programs that engage the whole family, not just the kids; and programs that reached families who weren't already a part of the STEM community. In the following 15 years I have worked on programs across the USA in a wide variety of communities, and with partners including parents, teachers, librarians, science centers, museums, the Motorola Foundation, NASA, and the National Science Foundation... all to realize my enthusiasm for families genuinely exploring and learning together, and to help them share and enjoy in that excitement. 

I have developed both passion and experience for what really works for families engaging in science exploration together -- which I have honed down to what I call the Five Pillars of Family Science.  These five pillars lay the foundation for parents to create and enjoy truly great family learning experiences. As children spend most of their time out of school, we must foster exploration outside the classroom to create a more scientifically literate society. This book, The Five Pillars of Family Science will give many more families the nudge, encouragement, support, and validation that they want or need to engage in learning science together. 

The book will represent a great step forwards from the typical "following a set of instructions in the kitchen" type family science that we often see on the shelves, to allow parents to start creating new and engaging moments of science exploration wherever and whatever they are doing. In this way it becomes second nature to nurture the whole family towards greater scientific literacy and critical thinking – essential for our 21st Century world.

Representing the Five Pillars of Family Science

What We Need & What You Get

We are aiming to raise $12500 to support a fund in our nonprofit organization, InsightSTEM, to provide my writing time and other efforts support for this endeavor to get the Five Pillars of Family Science book written and to publication – so that we can get families of all kinds engaging in exploring science together. During the month of November, I will be embarking on a writing retreat around the USA by rail. On my journey I will also interact with families and communities around the nation to add richness and relevance to the book. Your sponsorship of this project allow me to spend more time dedicated to writing the book, to get this work completed and shared with families who will benefit. Additional funds will go towards providing copies of the book to libraries and community centers that serve populations that are typically under-served and underrepresented in STEM fields to ensure that their families can also access these resources.

Word target calendar to keep me on "track"

The target here is to write 50000 words during the writing retreat in November -- and I hope that you will consider sponsoring some of those words... at just $0.25 a word! By reaching our goal, we should have the manuscript complete by the end of December 2015. Check back for regular updates!

Rewarding your Sponsorship...

For donations of over $75 I will send you a personalized and signed passage from the book, representing the length of the unique passage you sponsored (so for $75, you would get a passage about 300 words long). 

All sponsors of $125 or more are guaranteed to receive a signed pre-release copy of the book, and a mention in the acknowledgements.

Sponsors of over $250 will also receive free passes to "Five Pillars of Family Science" workshops offered by InsightSTEM for parents or other caregivers -- to use for yourself, or to share with others. 

There's an opportunity for some sponsors donating $1250 or more to select a location in the USA for me to host a "Five Pillars of Family Science" workshop for yourself and your chosen guests or audience – this could be for yourself and your friends and colleagues, or you could arrange for us to hold the workshop in an area of high need for STEM education support in out of school time.

In a unique and limited opportunity, you may also sponsor a chapter of the book for yourself, your family, or an organization. For a minimum contribution of $2000 you can sponsor one of the five pillars in this way. You will be able to select which pillar you would like to sponsor, work with me to select a quote to start your pillar’s chapter (from yourself, or someone we choose together), and you will be named as the sponsor of the pillar in both the book and in associated workshops delivered in both in-person and online formats.

If we don't reach our total goal, we will keep working to complete the book, but it will take a longer time to complete the work as I will have to devote more time to other projects, programs, and administrative duties in InsightSTEM. As with any project, this one will support a portion of my full time effort to allow me to get this writing done!

The Impact

InsightSTEM, and I, aim to make a real difference with this book to the way that people think about family science. Not only parents and families, who will be most immediately impacted, but also other organizations and authors work in this field, which while encouraging hands-on science at home, present it more along the lines of recipe books or step by step hand holding activities for kids, rather than allowing for true exploration and creative thought. These skills are essential for a more scientifically literate and critically thinking society, where children will be growing up in an expanding sphere of information overload.

The areas of greatest concern that I will have in mind to be inclusive of while writing the book, and where I hope that it can have the greatest impacts, are: Families that are non-traditional in their makeup, or are in communities that are under-served in the STEM opportunities that they have available to them; Families with kids who are about to enter, or are in, their early teenage years where many stop exploring science; and, any and all families who want to understand how to continue enjoying learning together.

Key Impact Groups for the book

As our world becomes increasingly scientifically and technically complex, and the amount of information that is available for consumption balloons each day, it is vital that the children who will make up the next generation -- and the parents and grandparents of this generation -- have the skills to explore that knowledge, and the attitude and desire to *want* to explore that knowledge.

Families will also be together for a lot longer too – so the skills of enjoying learning together will extend across generations. The date of my grandmother's birth is closer to the day that Darwin set sail on the Beagle and discovered Evolution than it is to today. Now she is a great grandmother of six. At her birth, it was almost unheard of for someone to have a living great grandparent, but a 13-year-old today is more than likely going to be an active great grandparent, still being out and about and hopefully engaging in science exploration with their great grandkids!

Risks & Challenges

There are obvious challenges with any creative work, of course, in terms of completing on the anticipated schedule. However, by starting off strong with a month long writing retreat with clear targets it will get us well underway to completing the goal. 

I will keep everyone updated on the targets and progress day by day during the writing month of November (following the calendar above) so that you can see how its progressing and motivate me to move on faster if necessary! The editing and completion by the end of December is an achievable goal, if we have managed to have enough time dedicated to the writing during November. 

We will also be working to find a publisher during that time which will make the distribution easier -- however, we do have publication channels identified that will allow us to get the copies we need for the perks earned by our sponsors to press no matter what the final publication situation may be.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t or choose not to help us out financially, there are many ways that you can help us out. Sharing the word about this effort is essential -- so please share it around on social media, by word of mouth, or to any parents or family organizations that you know or maybe are a part of. 

As I travel the country in November there will also be opportunities for you to learn more about the book, and give input from your own experiences if you are willing to meet over a coffee, lunch time, or evening discussion then let me know and I will try to include you in my cross country schedule.

Thanks for reading... especially if you made it this far... and I hope you will be able to help in the writing of this book either through your sponsorship, or through your support in any other ways!!

Jake Noel-Storr, PhD
President and CEO InsightSTEM
Tucson, AZ -- October 31, 2015

the STEM opportunities that they have available to them; Families with kids who

exploring science; and, any and all families who want to understand how to
continue enjoying learning together.


Key Impact Groups for the book
As our world becomes
increasingly scientifically and technically complex, and the amount of
information that is available for consumption balloons each day, it is vital
that the children who will make up the next generation -- and the parents and
grandparents of this generation -- have the skills to explore that knowledge,
and the attitude and desire to *want* to explore that knowledge.

Families will also be
together for a lot longer too – so the skills of enjoying learning together
will extend across generations. The date of my grandmother's birth is closer
to the day that Darwin set sail on the Beagle and discovered Evolution than it is
to today. Now she is a great grandmother of six. At her birth, it was almost
unheard of for someone to have a living great grandparent, but a 13-year-old
today is more than likely going to be an active great grandparent, still being
out and about and hopefully engaging in science exploration with their great
grandkids!
    Risks & Challenges 
There are obvious
challenges with any creative work, of course, in terms of completing on the
anticipated schedule. However, by starting off strong with a month long writing
retreat with clear targets it will get us well underway to completing the
goal. 
I will keep everyone
updated on the targets and progress day by day during the writing month of
November (following the calendar above) so that you can see how its progressing
and motivate me to move on faster if necessary! The editing and completion by
the end of December is an achievable goal, if we have managed to have enough
time dedicated to the writing during November. 

We will also be working to
find a publisher during that time which will make the distribution easier --
however, we do have publication channels identified that will allow us to get
the copies we need for the perks earned by our sponsors to press no matter what
the final publication situation may be.
    Other Ways You Can Help 
Even if you can’t or choose not to help
us out financially, there are many ways that you can help us out. Sharing the
word about this effort is essential -- so please share it around on social
media, by word of mouth, or to any parents or family organizations that you
know or maybe are a part of. 
As I travel the country
in November there will also be opportunities for you to learn more about the
book, and give input from your own experiences if you are willing to meet over
a coffee, lunch time, or evening discussion then let me know and I will try to
include you in my cross country schedule.
Thanks for reading...
especially if you made it this far... and I hope you will be able to help in
the writing of this book either through your sponsorship, or through your
support in any other ways!!
Jake Noel-Storr, PhD
President and CEO InsightSTEMTucson, AZ -- October 31, 2015

story:
Welcome to the THEDINOSOURCE crowdfunding campaign!

My name is Antonio and I am the main person behind this project. All too many of us know what it is like watching a loved one slowly slip away. First forgetting the name of a restaurant, then a favorite food, then eventually your name. Alzheimer’s disease is a devastating reality that has touched so many of our lives, and there is still no cure. But what if there was a way to detect the disease before the usual symptoms presented, to be able to seek treatment earlier, and to give you more days, months, and years with the ones you love? There is. This is exactly what I have created. 

What We Do & How We Do It

Here are THEDINOSOURCE, we are developing software that is able to deliver an early diagnosis of neurodegenerative diseases, by identifying which switches in a person's mind fail before others and do so with a higher degree of frequency. Given a preset switchboard, as the grammar of a language is known, the brain's deterioration can be identified and tracked through the close study of these linguistic switches. For example, a person may unknowingly begin referring to a certain item by the class it belongs to, rather than the name of the object itself. These types of recurring mistakes in the word retrieval process may go unnoticed, but through our research, may be the key to the early detection of a loved one's Alzheimer's disease. With your help, we can build the infrastructure needed to be able to pinpoint the elements that will help us provide you with an early diagnosis.


At the same time we are caring for the elderly, we also are dedicated to ensuring the success of the next generation. By applying these same principles and technologies, we are developing software to help children complete their switchboard sooner and better. In analyzing their speech, we can identify the switches that haven't yet been setup. Through adaptive, educational games, we can help them overcome linguistic obstacles, and at the same time, provide a usable framework to examine children with speech impairments. Our hope is that this linguistic tool will support both of your child's short- and long-term language development.

Once all of our research is completed, we will share what we have developed with you free of charge, as we believe your health is a right and not a privilege. But it will not stop there. Our software will be like a language: a living organism, constantly evolving and expanding. We firmly believe that from the development of such complex analysis, it will be possible to learn more about how certain diseases influence the brain, which we hope brings the medical community one step closer to finding a cure.

Indiegogo Perks

Before dwelling further into what pushed us to create thedinosource project, take a sneak peek at the amazing rewards you can get for helping us today.


In order we have: Stickers, Mug, Water Bottle, Pocket Notebook, Cufflinks and Tiebar and the wonderful thedinosource.com T-Shirt.

Now, it's time to tell you why we do what we do.

Our Motivation

Dino Ariozzi was my grandfather, and as a child he was my best friend. We didn’t live close to each other, but every single time I’d feel sick, he’d just pack up his teal bag and hop on the train for the three hour ride to my town, rushing over to make sure I was taken care of while my parents were at work. I still remember him going to the newspaper stand almost every morning to get me a small coloring book to play with. I remember watching TV next to him on the couch of the small apartment where my family and I used to live. I remember strolling downtown with him, and either he had incredible eyesight or the best luck, because nearly every time, we would find one or two coins between the cobblestones. He would let me keep all of them, of course, though at times I wondered if he was the one dropping them in the first place.

He was one of the kindest and most trustworthy people I have ever known. He worked as a carpenter most of his life, owning his own small business. After being a victim of fraud, he was forced to shut down his business and work until retirement to payback his debt to the state. Prior to this, he had also lost his son at the age of 7 to a particularly aggressive case of pneumonia. Despite all of this, he always had a passion for life and a smile on his face. He loved life and I loved him. 

During the time I was in high school, my family started noticing that something wasn't right, something had changed. He was no longer himself. At times, he would struggle to talk or even recognize us. We finally got the diagnosis: Alzheimer’s disease. 

I witnessed my best friend's mind slowly degenerate until he could no longer recognize me or knew what my name was. He spent the last year of his life in bed, at home, barely able to talk. On late night of July 29, 2011, after a six hour drive, we finally arrived at his house. Tired from the trip, I put my pajamas on, went to his room to say hi, and kissed him on his forehead. He was awake and, once again, I saw that huge smile that used to greet me as a child. 

I awoke the next morning to loud, frantic commotion around the house. Grandpa suddenly stopped breathing. Paramedics arrived less than a minute later, trying to resuscitate him. It didn’t work. I was there, I saw the life fading from his eyes. As I kissed his forehead one last time before the funeral, I promised him that I’d do everything I can to avoid other people having to see the ones they love slowly slip away, incapable of recognizing the very people they used to care for and share their life with. 

So Dino, Nonno, THEDINOSOURCE is for you and for all those out there, who are or will be affected with Alzheimer’s disease or speech-language pathologies. We are committed to finding out how and why these diseases progress, and to providing an early detection tool that will give you more precious days, months, and years with the ones you love. 

So no, sorry to disappoint you. No actual dinosaurs here. DINO is for my grandpa and SOURCE comes from the technologies we are developing. With your help, we aim to be your first source of information when it comes to Alzheimer’s or other speech-language pathologies. 

Where You Come In

We need your help! Creating this type of technology requires hours of processing audio recordings, integrating hundreds of pages of language into one program, creating and monitoring focus groups, and building the infrastructure necessary to open our software to the general public. We also need your help to consult with the medical community, to bring in Alzheimer's experts and those versed in other speech-language pathologies. We need your continued interest and support to finally address how in-depth speech analysis can open the door to finding cures for diseases from Alzheimer's to minor speech impediments. 

Specifically, your support will:

  • Allow us to work FULL TIME on this project, after all is the only noble way to repay you for giving us your trust
  • Purchase and maintain a small data center to store all the hours of speech recorded, and make sure they are stored securely
  • Allow us to formally incorporate our business
  • Hire someone to help us build the platform to code and store our data 
  • Identify and gather focus group participants to begin testing our software
  • Provide medical and speech-language pathology experts to serve as mentors during focus group phase
  • Process hours of recordings, data, and observations collected from focus groups
  • Develop public software platform, including a mobile application, to provide you with the support you need, when you need it
  • Consultations with leading IT experts and speech-language pathologists to ensure all angles of these diseases are being addressed by our technology
  • Presenting our research to the academic, medical, and business communities that have a stake in the success of our project
  • Launching the free, public software that brings us one step closer to a cure
  • Last, but not least, coffee and a whole lot of it - we are and will continue to spend long nights fighting to give you the days, months, and years you want with your loved ones

So, are you ready to join us in the fight against Alzheimer's disease and other speech-language pathologies? 

We need your help!

Campaign Image by Ben Smith

story:
We live in a tropical country...we need our hair to protect our scalps...well, that, and we quite like having hair!!   

But...we want to raise funds for SWTz, a residential children's centre and nursery school in northern Tanzania, providing a home and hope to orphans and vulnerable children, which we founded in 2005. 

On Tuesday January 5th 2016 we will shave our hair off to raise funds for our education fund!!!!!  :) :) :)   Will we look beautiful afterwards????  We think not, we're not young enough for it to look trendy... But we are prepared to do this for our children!!!  Er, how long DOES it take for hair to grow back...??  ;)

We need to raise £7,500 towards our education fund for 2016...and YOU will have the amazing opportunity to see what we look like with no hair...yikes!!!

We provide a good foundational education to our residential children, and we also run a 50-student nursery school as a service to our local community.  We need to raise £7,500 to cover all our school fees for our residential children, and subsidise our SWTz nursery school running costs. 

  • If we raise £5,000 we will get a number 2 cut...that's short!
  • If we raise £6,500 we will get a number 1 cut...that's shorter!!
  • If we raise the WHOLE £7,500 we will shave ALL our hair off!!! BALD!!!
  • If we raise MORE than £7,500 all additional funds raised will go towards uniforms, school shoes, school supplies, and supporting education of additional children in need in our local community!!!

You WILL make a difference

Education is one of the BEST ways to invest in a child's life in Tanzania:

  • Educating girls has been identified as 'one of the best solutions to reversing the relentless trend of poverty and disease devastating large portions of sub-Saharan Africa' (UN Chronicle).
  • One of our first residential boys is now studying law at university and wants to be a human rights lawyer...he was living on the streets when we found him...
  • One of our 10yr old girls came to us aged 7 never having attended even nursery school - she attended our SWTz nursery school for 3 months, learned to read and write, and is now consistently top of her class at primary school.

Why support us?

  • We are one of the best residential children's centres in our area, noted for the quality of our childcare.
  • Our SWTz nursery school offers not only education but through the school, our social workers identify families in the community needing additional urgent help
  • We DO what we SAY we will do...

Other ways you can help

Maybe you can't contribute with funds, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask your friends, colleagues, and family to get the word out and share our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Let's do it!!!

story:
Food & Behavior: The Complete Set

Inspired by Barbara Reed-Stitt's revolutionary work in the criminal justice and school systems. We want to facilitate a wakeup call that sends the clear message: whole, minimally processed food is directly linked to healthy behavior and needs to be a key part of criminal justice rehabilitation and local, state and federal educational policy for lasting success.

The Food & Behavior Set  $35


Includes: an updated edition of the book, Food & Behavior: A Natural Connection; Nutritional Guidelines for Correcting Behavior; a documentary on Barbara's journey of discovery, implementation and the details of her innovative success; a cd with informative interviews

It all began by chance. I had "Food & Behavior: A Natural Connection" in my library. I knew Barbara socially through mutual friends.

One day I was helping a friend on his job site. He had hired some guys to work with us who were living in a halfway house having just been released from prison for drug offenses. I was about to make a lunch run and assumed pizza was acceptable for them. Instead I was taken aback when one sheepishly asked if it would be ok if they could have a salad instead, preferably organic. For a minute I couldn’t connect the stereotypical assumptions of convicted drug offenders with their desire for a healthy organic meal.

I asked the youngest when his interest in organic food started. He said when he found a book in the prison library called Food & Behavior. He said it changed his life. Since then he only eats mostly fruits and vegetables and maintains a healthy diet. His friend joked he went from a drug addict to a health food addict. Impressed I treated them to the kind of healthy lunch I typically eat.



When I told Barbara about that meeting and how she had helped change his life. I learned with her using the protocols she developed as a probation officer 89 % of her clients stayed out of the prison system as compared to the typical recidivism rate of probationers that varies from 65 - 85 %. A cover story on her success appearing in the Wall Street Journal catapulted her to national media attention. She was featured on key TV shows, magazines and newspapers and lectured 30-40 times per year for 16 years, covering all states in the US and all provinces in Canada. She donated 12,000 copies to the prison libraries around the country giving many thousands the knowledge to transform their health and life.

From there, partnering with her husband, the late Paul A. Stitt, she was invited to apply her program in the educational system in Wisconsin though their Natural Ovens of Manitowoc natural foods bakery to outstanding success.

Below are examples of foods impact on behavior and mental capability.

Finding the circumstances of how this came to my attention remarkable I knew I had to be involved with spreading her work so that the information on what to do, why you want to do it and how you can do it finds the reception it needs for the widest possible benefit. We now have a scientific understanding of how food impacts behavior through its effect on the mind, body and brain. "Food & Behavior" cites numerous research findings supporting Barbara's findings.

Barbara Reed-Stitt is reinvesting 100 % of her profits back into this campaign. I have had a successful career producing and distributing product in the music, TV, film and publishing industries.  This non-profit project is closely aligned with my values and my desire to educate others on how to take charge of their health.

Our goal is to share this knowledge with as many criminal justice and education, professionals as possible. We are in the process of creating a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization to support this effort.

YOU can help raise the awareness that whole foods can have a transformative  impact on behavior and that benefits all of us. YOU can be the engine driving the change that helps make better individuals, families, communities, society.

Please contribute by making a donation or spreading the word. 

Questions? | Website | Facebook | #foodbehavior #barbararstitt

story:
In the way of Budo,

we are dedicated to perfecting the whole self

by integrating mind, body, and spirit,

until we are released from ego.

-Kisshomaru Ueshiba

The practice of Aikido, along with the practices of Iaido and Zazen, is like a compass which directs the completion and unification of body, mind, and spirit with the fundamental and creative spirit of the universe. Relentless and rigorous pursuit of this training, in an inclusive and nurturing environment of mutual respect, maximizes this transformation process. These transformations result in positive impacts on our lives, relationships and communities: transformations to overall health, a better understanding of how our actions affect others, an enhanced sense of personal responsibility, and a connectedness to the world around us.

Birankai North America is a nonprofit educational organization dedicated to promoting quality instruction and practice of the martial ways of Aikido. To ensure continued access to quality training programs sponsored by Birankai North America, the organization:

  • Conducts training seminars, camps, and sponsors teacher training programs
  • Develops curricula and teacher certification standards
  • Provides program development resources
  • Certifies ranks and promotions
  • Offers programs in Aikido, Iai-Battoho, and Zen meditation practices
  • Sponsors scholarships and grants to encourage training
  • Supports other similar activities

Founded in 2001, Birankai North America has grown greatly since its beginning and we have spread across North America from coast to coast and from Canada to Mexico. This success and growth presents the organization with a challenge: the need to bring the larger community together to ensure a coherent community and bring quality, experienced instruction to all of the members practicing the martial way through Aikido, Iaido, and Zazen. This endowment will sponsor seminars, which not only greatly enhance the ability of Birankai North America to address its mission but also answer the challenge that has arisen due to our success.

Birankai North America welcomes people of all ages, abilities, beliefs, incomes, races, nationalities, genders, and sexual identities.

More information about Birankai North America can be found at:

www.birankai.org

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCipdlAvTmLI8yV...

Please see our Endowment Campaign details at:

http://www.birankai.org/endowment/endowment.php

https://www.facebook.com/BirankaiSponsoredSeminarsFundraisingCampaign?fref=nf

Thank you for your generous support!

Birankai North America is a not-for-profit, 501 (c) (3) organization. Contributions, bequests, transfers or gifts made to Birankai North America are tax-deductible as specified by the Internal Revenue Service.
story_txt:
In the
way of Budo, 
we are
dedicated to perfecting the whole self
by integrating mind, body, and spirit, 
until
we are released from ego. 
-Kisshomaru
Ueshiba
The practice
of Aikido, along with the practices of Iaido and Zazen, is like a compass which
directs the completion and unification of body, mind, and spirit with the
fundamental and creative spirit of the universe. Relentless and rigorous
pursuit of this training, in an inclusive and nurturing environment of mutual
respect, maximizes this transformation process. These transformations result in
positive impacts on our lives, relationships and communities: transformations
to overall health, a better understanding of how our actions affect others, an
enhanced sense of personal responsibility, and a connectedness to the world
around us.
Birankai
North America is a nonprofit educational organization dedicated to promoting
quality instruction and practice of the martial ways of Aikido. To ensure continued access to
quality training programs sponsored by Birankai North America, the
organization:

Conducts training seminars,
     camps, and sponsors teacher training programs
Develops curricula and teacher
     certification standards 
Provides program development
     resources 
Certifies ranks and promotions 
Offers programs in Aikido,

     to encourage training

     activities

story:
My short story...

As a result of a serious car crash, I lost all of my childhood memories and my identity. I had to relearn basic emotions and the English language at age 11. It took 13 years to recover fully and the experience deeply impacted my family relationships.

However, through it all I recognised my beautiful connection with children and developed a passion for them to be loved just the way they are. So often we go through the motions of becoming a reflection of what we think people want us to be. If we simply listen to the desires of a child's heart we will find out what their destiny is.

My second chance...

Now with this second chance of LIFE I have an exciting, renewed purpose and in 2014 I self-published my first children's picture book 'Silly Eric' (see www.sillyeric.co.uk) with the key message that you are loved just the way you are. I am actively touring through the UK holding personal reading and writing workshops with young children, encouraging creativity and celebrating their unique qualities. The response has been incredible and I would like to take this into children's wards.

How will YOU make a difference? 

  • With your pledges I am aiming to make 45 Hospital visits over 2016 to spend quality time with children. Not only giving them hope after their injuries but listening to their needs from my personal life experiences of being in a car accident. I would like to read stories with them, do creative activities, hold reading and writing workshops with children who are yearning to be back in the community (similar to Patch Adams!) 
  • When you are trying to recover from a head injury or trying to adjust to the idea that you might not have long left to live, there are big gaps in your thoughts and lots of confusion. One of my gifts is to help children through this process.
  •  Parents have asked me to go into hospital and read to their children when sometimes they only have a few months left to live - I would like to always make them a BIG YES! 
  • I would also like to gift the children with a writing and colouring-in pack. 
Note: You can donate or pick a perk. The perks mean you will be getting something for the money you donate. 

By Ordering my NEW book TEA with BEA, you will be helping me achieve this! 

It gives you the chance to have an exciting sneaky peek of the NEW book before anyone does! It's based on a little girl I worked with and in fact it's a story I made up for her before putting her down for her nap. Join in with Beas colourful imagination and her best friend Elvis. It's a fun happy read for age 2-7.

Thank you so much for watching the video and reading through the blog. I hope you can find something that takes your fancy in the PERKS and I look forward to hearing from you.

Keep in touch!!
Thank you to my family and friends, Addenbrooke's ICU and Children's ward and to James Paget Accident and Emergency for your incredible care and support.  Thank you to Keisuke Yoshiura for letting us use his beautiful song.  
Big love!! XoX
